title: Beautiful gem in Munich!
text: This is a great place to visit after you have had your fill of tours. Rent a bike to make the most of all that the park has to offer. text: We explored these gardens on our final day visiting Munich. text: On our last day in Munich we decided to take a stroll to the English Garden, to be truthful at this time of year it wasnâ€™t much to see but the walk through the park to get there was stunning and can imagine it will be even better once spring weather is upon us. There were tons of people out running, walking, playing with their children or pets but you never felt crowded. The chinese pagoda is quite unique nearbyWell worth a wander on a pleasant day

title: Perfect way to enjoy at beautiful day!
text: My husband and I enjoyed a lovely lunch at the English Garden on a beautiful sunny September afternoon.  The place was busy, but we got our food quickly and it was pretty good.  Prices were OK, too.

title: Worth checking out

title: Rigenerante
text: Se andate a Monaco, anche in pieno inverno, non potete non trascorrere qualche ora nel Giardino inglese. Un vero e proprio polmone verde. Una bella passeggiata, una birra e via. Se avete fortuna, troverete anche dei surfisti. Purtroppo non ho avuto questa fortuna. Ma ne Ã¨ valsa la pena godersi un po' di natura.

title: Magical Munich
text: Munich is a magical place and I would recommend every visitor goes to the English Garden On a sunny winters day itâ€™s magical
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: A walk on the cold side.
text: Generally referred to as Munichâ€™s green lung this is a peaceful place to spend a couple of hours. Most people tend to gravitate to the Chinese Tower and even on the day we visited with the temperature barely above freezing there were plenty of people sat outside enjoying a beer or gluhwein. However if you are entering the park from the corner of Prinzregenten and Lerchenfeld Strasse there is a lovely little cafe which seems to be in a converted public convenience. Donâ€™t be put off it is very popular with local office workers and has a welcoming atmosphere and log fire. Ideal on a cold day. One of the more bizarre sights was a young man surfing downstream of a weir on the Eisbach. Keep a lookout for Red Squirrels.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Great Park!
text: Great location in the heart of Munich. Plenty of things to discover like the pagoda and the Biergarten! You might Even find surfers !

title: A treasure in the heart of Munich
text: Walking through this park is an absolute delight. In nice weather (we had nice weather in February), it's packed full of people running, biking, eating, drinking and just generally lounging. Plus they have surfing in the river. One of the highlights of our time in Munich.

title: Amazing Park
text: Do not miss the English Garden!!!  It is a great place to enjoy a stroll.  We were lucky to have the leaves changing in the fall which only added to the experience - lucky us.Many people come to run, walk, play soccer and just enjoy the area.  There are rentals at the lake for paddle boats.  There are restaurants, restrooms and a bier garden within the park.To give perspective, this park is larger than Central Park in NYC.  So make sure you take the time to experience it all!

title: River surfing, ducks and more
text: Such a lovely walk on a mild winter afternoon in the green lungs of Munchen! We walked along the river and chanced on the river surfers having a fine time though Iâ€™m sure the water was cold!Very relaxing and beautiful walk!

title: Beautiful!
text: We had a leisurely stroll through the garden in the afternoon. We saw the surfers and lots of locals that were exercising and walking dogs. They take their dog training seriously in Europe! Most dogs were off leash and well behaved. The park is a beautiful way to experience local culture and get a breath of fresh air.

title: Excellent park to get out of the apartment, hotel or house.
text: This is a park in Munich where you can easily and quickly get out to sun tan, picnic, run, cycle, walk, play soccer, or even some cricket. You can meet people or just sit on your own and enjoy the outdoors. Lots of space where you can be relatively alone or be close to people.

title: Excelente Experiencia ao ar livre
text: Um Ã³timo local para piquenique e curtir um fim de tarde. Aproveitar para fazer atividades ao ar livre em Munique Ã© uma Ã³tima pedida.

title: Huge Garden
text: This is quite a large garden and you can watch river surfing!  The scenery is beautiful.  We were there when the leaves were changing and the colors were spectacular!  Itâ€™s a nice break from the city.

title: A really chil place in the heart of the city
text: You must visit the English Garden if you want to experience the relaxed atmosphere of a park, where people hang out, take a break or jog along. The beer garden in the center of the English Garden is a more touristy place.

title: Glorious way to spend the day.
text: Start at the Japanese Tea House, stop to watch the surfers! So very cool! Then continue on to the Bier Garten. Even off season there is food and drink. I did walk all the way up to the Kneipe (pub), around the lake then back to the University subway stop. So much to see; beautiful gardens, lovely trails and fields to enjoy. Bring a picnic! I will definitely walk to park again next visit

title: Wow - great stroll
text: Such a lovely place for a stroll. Lots of peopleOut walking, running and taking their pets out for an outing. Certainly worth a wonder, even in the winter.

title: Nice and peaceful
text: Only a few minutes walk from the busy streets, The English Garden is great for those wanting to escape the busy lifestyle. Here you can enjoy walking, swimming and many other sports however please do be warned in the summer months people tend to shed their clothes. Yes naked, butt naked.

title: Sous la pluie!
text: Nous avons traversÃ© ce jardin sous la pluie et en hiver, ce n'Ã©tait pas la bonne pÃ©riode pour apprÃ©cier ce lieu!

title: Bem bacana mesmo no inverno
text: Dei uma volta pelo local depois de passar por Marienplatz. Ã‰ um tÃ­pico parque: com pista de corrida (de areia), muito verde com Ã¡rvores ao redor e um lago (pequeno) onde algumas pessoas brincavam com seus cachorros e uns patos. o espaÃ§o Ã© bem grande e deve ser um ponto de encontro no verÃ£o. Para um dia muito frio de dezembro o lugar estava com bastante gente.

title: Nice to walk.
text: If have spare time and want to have a walk, English gardeni is a very good choise. Easy to reach via U-Bahn. Long walk paths, beauitiful  trees, tweeting birds.. What else will you need to relax ?

title: Pulmon de Munich
text: Jardin extenso, verdadero pulmon de Munich es como estar en el campo.Cascadas, animales, bosque frondoso recorrido por caminos. Se respira tranquilidad.

title: A beautiful and peaceful garden to wander
text: Full of different areas to experience and sights to behold, the English Garden is free to visit and a must see when in Munich; p.s. make sure to take in the nearby Hofgarten whilst in the city.

title: Sehr schÃ¶n
text: Im Februar vielleicht nicht die erste Adresse,  aber ein toller Park und schÃ¶n angelegt und ein Ruheplatz mitten in der Stadt!

title: Winter in the gardens
text: Great place to spend some time away from the city. It is an easy walk. Just a little disappointed as a number of attractions were closed for the winter and renovations. May just be a better place to visit in Summer.

title: Excelente parque urbano
text: Ã‰ um parque enorme e muito lindo, com perfeitas paisagens europeias. Sugiro conhecer o Monopteros, uma construÃ§Ã£o no alto com inspiraÃ§Ã£o clÃ¡ssica, a torre chinesa, percorrer as trilhas ao lado do rio Eisbach, ver o pessoal surfando. Muito bacana.Achei bem seguro e tranquilo andar por lÃ¡.

text: Tellement enchantÃ©s par cet endroit unique au monde que nous sommes retournÃ©s en Septembre . Au programme dÃ©tente baignade naturisme libertÃ© . Toujours incroyable de pouvoir Ãªtre nus sans stress dans ce grand parc nature..... Aucun regard aucune rÃ©flexion impensable en France!

title: Nice walk through the park, with good views of the city.
text: Walked through part of this enormous park when on a long weekend. The grounds are well maintained, with a few stalls in the center for food and beer. Also had a dome in the centre with a great viewpoint of the city. Had a mixture of people chiling out and using the park. Also has a manmade river, where people were surfing, which made for a good watch. Highly recommend a stroll through.

title: Ein riesiger Park mit vielen MÃ¶glichkeiten
text: Der Englische Garten ist ein riesiger Park der sich vom Haus der Kunst bis in den Norden MÃ¼nchens erstreckt. Sehr bekannt ist die Surfwelle am Eisbahn gleich hinter dem Haus der Kunst.Hier gibt es auch ein japanisches Teehaus. Von dort kann man zum Monopterus gehen und weiter zum Chinesischen Turm. Hier stehen Kutscher fÃ¼r Fahrten durch den Englischen Garten bereit und die Kinder kÃ¶nnen mit einem Ã¼ber 100 Jahre alten Karrussel fahren. Im Sommer kann man hier im Biergarten sitzen und im Advent findet man rund um den Turm einen sehr schÃ¶nen Weihnachtmarkt. Ein StÃ¼ck weiter kommt der Kleinhesseloher See mit dem Seehaus einem schÃ¶nen Restaurant mit Biergarten. Ein Kahnverleih ist auch da. AuÃŸerdem gibt es Reitwege und Radwege im englischen Garten. FÃ¼r jeden ist etwas dabei. Mit seinen 375 Hektar ist der Englische Garten der grÃ¶ÃŸte Park der Welt.

text: Este jardÃ­n es un rincÃ³n Imprescindible de visitar en esta bella ciudad. Dar un paseo por el, ver su rÃ­os , lago y tomar una cerveza en alguno de sus Biergarden son una pieza clave del turismo de Munich. title: Maravilhoso
text: Vale a pena a visita. Mas o parque Ã©  bem grande, entÃ£o vÃ¡ com tempo e vontade de andar para explorar todos os cantos do parque. Vale a pena.

title: In mezzo al verde
text: Facilmente raggiungibile dietro al residenz Munich, il giardino inglese si estende per un bel po' di chilometri. Vi consiglio magari di andarci di domenica da poter ammirare il panorama. All interno troverete un laghetto con con anatre e papere e poi avanti il monopteros. A proseguire il ristorante bavarese /cinese con la struttura eretta per le olimpiadi. Il parco manca di indicazioni ma per il resto Ã¨ un bel posto. Presumo in estate ancor meglio.

title: Prepara la tabla de surf y el picnic
text: Emblematico parque de la zona bÃ¡vara donde podres realizar multitud de deportes o tomar una cerveza en alguno de sus bonitos Biergarten. En la epoca que yo lo visite hacia bastante frÃ­o por lo que no invitaba mucho a hacer un picnic o tomar una cerveza al aire libre, pero muchos de mis amigos me comentan que en la epoca de verano es muy facil ver a familias enteras hacer picnics en sus grandes zonas verdes y practicar deportes al aire libre.En el interior del parque existen diferentes puntos de obligada visita, la casa del tÃ© china, su pagoda japonesa o un templo de estilo griego.Dentro del propio parque existe un canal artificial llamado Eisbach (arroyo helado) donde los aficionados al surf disfrutan de unas pequeÃ±as olas en las epocas de calor, si eres aficionado a este deporte os recomiendo que os lleveis la tabla para quitaros el gusanillo.Para mi lo mejor que tiene este parque son los diferentes Biergarten que existen para relajarte tomando unas buenas cervezas alemanas y disfrutar de algun rayo de sol.

title: Get away from the City
text: This is a really lovely space in the middle of the city.Withing minutes you feel like youâ€™re in the middle of the countryside.Itâ€™s a great place to get away from the noise of the city for a few minutes.If youâ€™re lucky, you may even see the surfers, yes surfers on the river.

title: Beautiful Green space in Munich
text: This is a lovely park to walk around and soak in the flowers, streams and waterfalls. It's a perfect place to relax and get away from the busy urban area.

text: Hier kann man gut spazieren gehen sich ausruhen und Energie tanken. Der englische Garten ist riesig und bekannt fÃ¼r seine Eisbachwelle, den chinesischen Turm und viele weitere SehenswÃ¼rdigkeiten

title: Like Central Park in NY
text: Amazing recreational park in the middle of the town. Close to university and central museums.Went for an early morning run. Felt save the whole time.

title: Christmas Market
text: We visited with friends who had never been to Munich for the Christmas Markets. We have been here many times in the summer but it was a few years since we had been to the Chinesischen Turm Christmas Market and we were not disappointed. The stalls surround the tower and offer a wide range of home made decorations, jewellery and clothing. There is a hut that offers craft making for children and another with story telling for younger children. The food is superb, particularly the pulled ox sandwich. You can rake horse and carriage rides through the park from here

title: Nice and relaxing, easy to access
text: We walked to the Garten from Marienplatz, with the idea to visit the Chinesischer Turm on the other side. It wasn't the best time to visit a park - end of December, temperature near to freezing, rain and wind - but we made the best of it. It was still a lovely visit. There's a river that runs through the greenery, a couple cute pedestrian bridges, lots of walking paths, and the Monopteros in the center of it all.Despite the cold and the rain, we spent a good amount of time in the park. We made a beeline for the Chinese Market, but on our way out, we strolled the paths, visited the Monopteros, took a ton of pictures and took our time leaving.It's tucked behind a quaint neighborhood, with a few small cafes and shops lining the streets on the way in. They also have a fun Biergarten on the way in, with a couple of old ski buggies (is that the right term for it?) offering shelter from the weather.I'd love to go back in another season, to be able to enjoy everything the park has to offer in heat and sunshine.

title: SchÃ¶ner Christkindlmarkt
text: Der Christkindlmarkt beim Chinesischen Turm ist wirklich einen kleinen Ausflug wert. Nicht Ã¼berlaufen, gutes Essen und Trinken. Die Angebote sind bodenstÃ¤ndig. Einfach nett.

title: A Quiet Refuge
text: Munich is a large and crowded city, especially around Christmas and this is a wonderful place to get away from it all and relax.  We went to the Christkindlmarkt there, walked around a bit and really enjoyed being there.

title: A must when in Munich
text: We went here for the day. We were lucky as the weather was stunning. We found a nice table to sit at. There was a band playing and we didnâ€™t have to queue for a drink or food. It was a great atmosphere all round. This was in the beer Garten there. You can freely walk around the gardens and take in the views and culture. We will go back for sure.

title: Beautiful place for 365 days a year
text: Quick walk or favourite jogging path- English Garden is my favourite place in the whole Munich . Especially catching sunsets.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Incommensurabile
text: Abbiamo visitato questo parco soltanto in parte perchÃ¨ Ã¨ davvero immenso e necessiterebbe almeno un giorno per essere girato totalmente. Suggestiva la pagoda cinese e soprattutto lo spettacolo dei surfisti vicino al ponte. Unico.

title: Beautiful gardens!!
text: Huge, majestic and not much to see in the winter, but this is worth a walk through. If it is a sunny day, bring some pretzels and sit in a bench to enjoy the amazing surroundings.

title: A Must!
text: I have done the English Garden in August, October, and December, and I have loved it every time! The Chinese tower and accompanying beir garden (or Christmas Market depending when you go) is such a wonderful experience)

title: schÃ¶ner Ort zum Chillen
text: ich bin immer wieder gern hier, irgendjemand macht Musik, Biergarten, oder einfach nur chillen mit Freunden

title: Great place to relax, unwind...or exercise
text: Been to Munich a few times and always like to stay near the English Garden - it is a great place to go for an early morning run. You can make the distance as long or short as possible and visit some of the sites within the garden along the way.

title: Wonderful for walking any time of the year,
text: We have visited at many times of the year. Particularly good during the Christmas Market time and in the summer months.

title: Meraviglia in cittÃ
text: Il giardino inglese Ã¨ stata una bella scoperta,un bel polmone verde a due passi dal centro cittÃ ! Posto adatto a tutti per qualsiasi tipo di movimento,per rilassarsi e staccare un po' la spina.

title: A lovely park, perfect on a nice day
text: The park is much bigger than I expeced, and you cannot drive the e-scooters inside, so either prepare for a lot of walking, or rent a bike.There are many different areas inside, from rivers to dense forests, open plains, restaurants, beer gardens, we even seen snakes.Perfect place to go on a nice summers' day.

title: Paseo muy agradable
text: El jardÃ­n inglÃ©s es como una burbuja dentro de Munich, doonde los locales y los turistas pasean, juegan o descansan en la pagoda china bebiendo buena cerveza

text: Einer der schÃ¶nsten PlÃ¤tze MÃ¼nchens. Spaziergang durch den Englischen Garten ist zu jeder Jahreszeit wunderschÃ¶n. Eisbach, Monopteros, Chinesischer Turm, Seehaus am Kleinhesseloher See, aber auch den ursprÃ¼nglichen Nordteil  mit Aumeister und Schwammerlweiher nicht vergessen. Traumhaft

title: Impressive

title: Non bello come si pensa
text: Giardino immenso ma adatto piÃ¹ che altro per attivitÃ  sportive. Ci sono 2/3 punti di interesse che bon faranno spalancare la bocca. Non utile visitarlo.

title: Enorme, no meio da cidade
text: Parque localizado no centro da cidade, muito grande. Permite atÃ© surfar! VÃ¡rios caminhos demarcados, bom para um bom passeio.

title: Bem no meio da cidade
text: O parque Ã© enorme (maior que o Central Park!) e fica bem no meio da cidade. Tem surf no rio Issar, atÃ© mesmo no inverno! Ã“timo lugar para passear, descansar ou ler um livro. Infelizmente nÃ£o tive muito tempo para explorÃ¡-lo, ainda assim ficou uma Ã³tima impressÃ£o.

title: Passeggiata a Monaco
text: Sinceramente mi aspettavo qualcosa di piÃ¹, parco grande ma non troppo curato, ci si puÃ² passeggiare andare in bici o correre ma niente piÃ¹. Da migliorare l intrattenimento per i piÃ¹ piccini. Per trascorrere un paio di ore nel verde e nella tranquillitÃ  Ã¨ l ideale.

title: Bello ma...
text: Il giardino Ã¨ enorme, ci sono tantissimi spazi verdi. Ci sono anche dei torrenti che scorrono al suo interno e, all'inizio del parco, dal lato di Marienplatz, ci sono addirittura degli impavidi surfisti che cavalcano le onde di uno di questi torrenti. Ci sono diverse aree recintate dove i bambini possono giocare con scivoli e altalene. Sono rimasto un po' deluso quando sono arrivato piÃ¹ o meno al centro del parco, dove doveva trovarsi un laghetto. La zona era tutta transennata, il laghetto quasi secco e poco curato. Vi erano diversi rami secchi a terra. Non so come mai non ci sia manutenzione in questa zona... peccato perchÃ© il parco Ã¨ veramente bello

title: Traditie nieuw jaarsdag
text: Wandelen in Englischer Garten is voor ons een traditie op 1 januariFantastische plek in MÃ¼nchen om te ontspannen
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Nice garden very near the city
text: Very nice Garden which is just a few steps away from the city center. Certainly worth a visit if you be in Munich.

title: A forest in a city
text: The English Garden is a great place when you want to take a few relaxing breaths in the city. Even though we visited it during the winter it was great. Fresh air, nice walking paths.

title: Expansive Park in Munich
text: This was our second time in the English Garden - the first was Spring 2014 - and so we definitely observed the park in a different seasonal context. And while in truth it's nicer when the trees are in bloom and when more people are out (enjoying the warm weather), it was a still a nice chance for us to stroll through this large park, specifically to get to the Chinese Tower. Be sure to give a least a little thought to which walking path you want to go down, or else you may find yourself either backtracking or detouring over the grass to get where you want to go.

title: Lindo, atÃ© no frio
text: Grande parque com longos gramados planos, muito similar aos parques de Londres. Mesmo no frio e jÃ¡ prÃ³ximo do anoitecer dÃ¡ pra fazer um bom passeio. Ã‰ seguro

title: Passeggiata molto piacevole
text: Attraversare tutto il giardino prende un giorno intero, ma ne vale davvero la pena.Bellissimo giardino con al centro un bier garten bellissimo.Consigliatissimo

title: Niente di che
text: Non mi Ã¨ piaciuto tenuto male e nn per niente accogliente, mi aspettavo un parco tenuto bene anche dâ€™inverno invece era tutto mal tenuto. Peccato

title: Einfach ein schÃ¶nes pfleckschen Erde
text: Wir waren ende November hier und hatten etwas Pech mit dem Wetter.Trotzdem haben wir den langen Spaziergang genossen.Der Besuch des Chinesischen Turms und der Surfer in dem Eisbach ist ein Muss.Ein Punkt Abzug aufgrund der schlecht Ã¼bersichtlichen Orientierungsschilder.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Must See Munich Sanctuary
text: Love this park and all that it offers.  Beautiful open space with historic features and plenty of room to stretch your legs, take a siesta, decompress from a hectic travel schedule, or to catch a quick game of football.  A lovely Biergarten in the southern part and decorated for the holidays.  Easy a metro ride from Munich Hfb and worth a couple hours of your time if youâ€™re weary of museums and other venues.  Pack a picnic and make it a a half-day respite!

title: Conversations with German students in the nude
text: My first time in Munich was a wonderful experience. While walking through and exploring these majestic gardens, about ten students approached me and asked where I was from. After I told them they asked me if I wanted to join them under a shade tree.  After we sat down they proceeded to undress to the buff and open a picnic lunch.  They offered to share their lunch with me and continue our discussion if I would join them by removing my clothing. Since the others were now nude, I decided to join them. It was extremely relaxing to talk with the students and have many discussions about our countries. It was apparent that these individuals are more open to body image. Back at the hotel, I discovered that the spa was also nude. Since it was my first time in Munich and experienced this novel lifestyle, I will surely return next year.

title: Pulmon verde
text: Parque inmenso para caminar correr tiene un lago varias entradas, es muy llano y verde. Merece la pena perderse unas horas. Al principio  tiene una zo a con un rÃ­o donde surfear la gente. Muy chulo
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Meraviglioso
text: Bellissimo e curato parco che occupa un intero giorno per visitarlo tutto! Oltre alla possibilitÃ  di camminare, andare in bici e portare a spasso il proprio cane, offre anche  monumenti da visitare e ristori da provare! Ãˆ a disposizione anche un servizio autobus per attraversarlo in quanto Ã¨ piÃ¹ grande del central park d'America!

En stor vacker park som korsas av en massa smÃ¥ klargrÃ¶na vattendrag med vatten frÃ¥n Isar, stora grÃ¤sytor blandat med vackra trÃ¤dpartier anlagda som "skog". SÃ¶dra delen Ã¤r den mest parklika och vÃ¤lbesÃ¶kta, norra delen mer lik en skog och med mindre folk.Dom biergartens som ligger hÃ¤r Ã¤r inte dom mest prisvÃ¤rda och naturligtvis fulla med bÃ¥de turister och en del MÃ¼nchenbor, men det kan ju vara trevligt det med.

title: A walk through the English Garden is always a pleasure at whatever time of year you visit
text: You can just do sections of this park, or walk the full length, with convenient U-Bahn stations dotted around to plan your journey. Also has little bars and cafes dotted around the park, for food and drink. A lovely large green park in the middle of this great city

title: Better and larger than Central Park
text: Munich's huge and unique public park is worth any step both in the crowded an cosy southern part and in the lovely landscape of the northern one.

title: Gigantesque
text: Enorme! malgrÃ© le froid et la grisaille, petite ballade dans ce parc immense. Meme si les marchÃ©s de Noel sont termines, il y a du monde qui se ballade. Vraiment un endroit calme t reposant. Cela doit Ãªtre au top en Ã©tÃ©! A voir absolument

title: precioso
text: Despues de visitar la residencia nos paseamos por el, jardin ingles, es enorme y solamente estuvimos una hora, pero vale la pena

title: Ein StÃ¼ckchen Paradies
text: Das Paradies muss in Bayern liegen - und der Englische Garten ist ein StÃ¼ck davon. Man muss es nicht betonen: Ein Erholungsort erster Klasse, Super-Gastronomie (Chinesischer Turm, Seehaus, Biergarten am Seehaus), weitlÃ¤ufig mit vielen Wegen und VerweilplÃ¤tzen - da muss eine andere Stadt ert einmal mithalten kÃ¶nnen. Heutzutage nicht mehr so ganz selbstverstÃ¤ndlich in deutschen StÃ¤dten: Keine Drogendealer, keine Kriminellen und die Polizei ist bei BelÃ¤stigungen sehr schnell zur Stelle. Einfach ein wunderschÃ¶ner und sicherer Ort im Herzen von MÃ¼nchen.

title: Surf no Rio
text: Um belÃ­ssimo parque cortado por um rio onde hÃ¡ um ponto para surf. Linda paisagem. Patos, corvos. No pagode chinÃªs pode-se comer um bom prato ou sanduiche de salsicha r tomar uma cerveja, clara escura ou de trigo.

title: Sehr zu empfehlen
text: Der Garten/Park ist riesig und sehr schÃ¶n. Im Sommer natÃ¼rlich schÃ¶ner. Man kann gut essen und trinken. Der Biergarten ist ein muss.Mit dem Auto oder per Bus erreichbar. Auch fÃ¼r Autos ohne grÃ¼ne Etikette mÃ¶glich.

title: Sehr viele MÃ¶glichkeiten
text: Park lohnt sich fast fÃ¼r alles was mit der Natur zu tun hat. Joggen, Fahrrad, Spazieren, Gassi-Gehen oder einfach nur entspannen mitten in MÃ¼nchen.Waren im Nov. 2019 dort und konnten schon die ersten StÃ¤nde des Weihnachtsdorfes am Chinesischen Turm besuchen.Sehr schÃ¶nes Ambiente.

title: Remanso de paz
text: Indudablemente serÃ­a un error estar en Munich y no disfrutar de este esplendoroso y grandioso jardÃ­n inglÃ©s, que te permite desconectarte y relajarte en un paseo y parada en Ã©l

title: Beautiful winter gardens
text: From surfers to the Chinese pagoda the gardens are beautiful in winter . There are Christmas markets with Mulled wine and beer , bratwurst and chestnuts. The crafts are the same in all the Munich Christmas markets and are quite pricey. The park is a wide expanse of green in the city and is well worth a visit.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Ook in de winter een aanrader
text: Leuke wandeling. Mooi uitzicht vanaf het torentje in het midden. Leuke koffieplek in kleine kabelbaanwagonetjes. Zelf in de winter wordt er gesurft! Leuk om even bij dit waterspektakel te kijken.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

text: Wer in MÃ¼nchen das GefÃ¼hl von Landschaft braucht, sollte in den Englischen Garten gehen. Man kann ruhigere, aber auch belebte PlÃ¤tze finden. Ganz nach Belieben.ğŸŒ³ğŸğŸ‚ğŸŒ¼ğŸŒ»

title: Magical Christkindlmarkt in the English Garden
text: This was amazing! My husband and I joined friends with small children and we thoroughly enjoyed the market and the park. It was truly magical with all the lights, GlÃ¼hwein, music, etc!
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: not much to see in a cold day
text: This garden is easily accesible from old town and surely it would be very attractive to see it in spring or summer but didn't offer much in a cold and rainy day.

title: Lugar belÃ­ssimo que deve ser visitado
text: O parque Ã© enorme, com um rio no qual alguns se arriscam a praticar surf. Bom para caminhar, descansar, passear com crianÃ§as, cachorros, conversar e admirar a bela natureza.

title: parco cittadino
text: bellissimo parco quasi al centro della cittÃ  molto frequentato dagli abitanti di monaco ottima la birreria mi pare Pauliner sia per la birra alla spina che per arrosti di prosciutto ecc.

title: DesconexiÃ³n
text: Lugar silencioso, ideal para relajarse y caminar por los largos caminos interconectados. Puedes pasear por el parquebdurante horas y pararte en los diferentes bancos con curiosas plaquitas. Hay diferentes atracciones como la ola del rÃ­o.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Im Winter ist wenig los.
text: Im Winter ist natÃ¼rlich wenig los. Der Pavillon ist aber geÃ¶ffnet und schenkt normal aus + GlÃ¼hwein. Alles wird von BlÃ¤ttern befreit und ist somit gepflegt und sauber. Suppe, Kaiserschmarrn, Kuchen etc. Werden auch gerne genommen. Unsere Currywurst war nichts. Eigene Schuld, ist das etwa eine bayrische SpezialitÃ¤t? Wir werden im Sommer wieder kommen.

title: Beautiful
text: Beautiful park - huge! A must see in Munich, one not to be missed.  Id imagine lovely in the sunshine or the snow

title: It is not a garden... It is a forest!
text: I have walking the English Garden many times and it is always a pleasure and an adventure. it is so big that it is almost impossible to discover it in one day, you have to go back many times and in all seasons, this park has always something to offer.Simply stunning.

title: Die Top Adresse fÃ¼r einen kurzen Spaziergang im Park
text: Das wunderschÃ¶ne und groÃŸe ParkgelÃ¤nde im Bereich der Innenstadt provoziert zu lÃ¤ngerem Spaziergang. Eisbachwelle mit den Surfern, Chinesischer Turm mit Biergarten und Denkmal sind lohnende Detailziele bei diesem Rundgang

title: A place for all seasons
text: Wonderful - a place for all seasons. This park is so huge I believe it easily dwarves Central Park and Hyde Park. A short walk from the Museum district as well. Note to self to revisit in the spring.

title: Surprise Christmas Market
text: We went to see this Garden and thought that we would walk around the lake but the lake was empty for the winter.Our trip here improved when we found a Christmas Market. This market was small but had everything you would want.  There were also roundabouts for the children and a nativity scene.

title: Beautiful even in winter
text: Beautiful garden to stroll around even in winter. Make sure you go and find the surfers, was a highlight for us.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Enorme parque para perderse
text: Dicen que es el parque mÃ¡s grande del mundo, puedes pasar horas y horas paseando, muy agradable. Creo que deberÃ­a  tener carteles informativos o mapas para no perderse dentro y situar las atracciones que tiene, llegar hasta donde los surferos estÃ¡n haciendo surf, es muy entretenido. Fuimos hasta allÃ­ y despuÃ©s anduvimos otros 20 minutos hasta otro mercadillo en otro de los extremos del parque que se llama Chinese park

title: Nice garden
text: The best garden in Munich.There is a beautiful vegetation, many places where to be calm and slepp a little.I recommand this place

title: Must do. Beautiful place in the middle of Munich
text: This is an absolutely fantastic place in Munich. It is a huge natural area in the middle of the city, where you can find calm and peace, and where you have fantastic views and fresh air. Apart from the views just of walking, there is a Chinese tower with a lovely Christmas Market and a lovely temple on a hill from where to watch the views. It is especially beautiful with snow in December!

title: Lovely park with a great beer garden inside
text: Enjoyed the park on a sunny day in Munich. Great beer garden with plenty of seating. Look for the surfers on the way in, did not think I would enjoy it but we watched mesmerized for a half hour.

title: Gassi gehen mit Hund
text: Seit vielen Jahren gehe hier regelmÃ¤ÃŸig mit meinem Hund Gassi. Hier findet man alles. SchÃ¶ne Wiesen zum toben, Rad fahren und sonnen. Man hat Sonne, Schatten und auch Wasser zum erfrischen und die Hunde kÃ¶nnen trinken und baden.Der Englische Garten ist einfach herrlich. Nicht zu vergessen die BiergÃ¤rten.

title: Relajante
text: JardÃ­n muy extenso y tranquilo para dar un  buen paseo. Hay varios parques infantiles para que los niÃ±os jueguen y la torre china es curiosa

title: Green and peaceful
text: I really liked the place. Green and peaceful. Some people were surfing in the creek. It was a good place to take creek photos also

title: Lovely christmas markets
text: Lovely christmas markets less crowded than in the centre of munich. The food was good and it was much easier to get a beer ! Make sure you go when it's dark though makes it all look more festive
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Very pretty
text: Very pretty park to walk through (or ride a bike) and at the Chinese Gardens there is a Chistmas Market going on with lots of yummy food.

title: Perfeitos para uma boa caminhada
text: Apesar de ser quase inverno, nÃ£o deixam de ter a sua beleza, extensos relvados, bons passeios de bicicleta, um rio que encanta. Perfeito para passear com a famÃ­lia. E encontrei um beargarten, perfeito para uma bebida quente.

title: Entspannung
text: Ã„hnlich wie Central Park. Eisbachwelle ist auch dort. So gross grÃ¼ne Wiesen, dort gibt Picknick, Spiele, Spielplatz, Biergarten usw. SchÃ¶n lange Spaziergang, Luft tut mir gut

title: DecepciÃ³n
text: PensÃ¡bamos encontrarnos unos maravillosos jardines y al final es un parque enorme verde y con Ã¡rboles sin mÃ¡s
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Bonito paseo
text: Bajamos en Giselastrasse y recorrimos el parque direcciÃ³n sur cruzÃ¡ndonos con el mercado navideÃ±o, la pagoda, Monopteros y la ola del surf hasta llegar a la Residenz. Bonito y tranquilo paseo.

title: Pra passar o dia
text: Um parque enorme, que tem desde Ã¡rea de descanso ao surf em qualquer Ã©poca do ano. DÃ¡ pra ficar boas horas sentada na grama.

title: Un polmone verde al centro di una grande cittÃ
text: Bellissimo parco con canali e prati . Si puÃ² passare un intera giornata a contatto con la natura ..fermarsi .Attraversando parte di questo grande giardino ho avuto la sensazione di vivere ai primordi , senza auto senza cemento senza biciclette solo il suono delle acque e il calpestio delle scarpe ..una passeggiata che consiglio a chiunque vada a Monaco .
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: exparcimiento
text: Fuimos a ver el mercadillo navideÃ±o y esta muy bien, ademÃ¡s para ser entre-semana muy animado. Tienen sobre todo puestos de comida. el jardÃ­n es grandisimo y si vas por Munich no dejar de visitar.

title: Great place for a bike ride. Not to be missed.
text: My family and I rented bikes at the Hauptbahnof to ride around Munich and the Englischer Garten could not be missed. They have several attractions from historic buildings and items to surfing on the Eisbach river. Recommended.

title: Nice Urban Park
text: Nice place to get some air and a good walk  Lots of locals with their families and dogs.  Good urban park.

title: a Day visit
text: what a huge English Garden  amazing to visit and in Munich  a very nice place to visit we had all fun it was a pleasure seeing

title: Englischgarden
text: It's a very large and well maintained garden. Walking, running, biking or just relaxing. This place is appropriate for all.

title: The lungs of the city
text: Fantastic open space where you can run, cycle, walk, horse ride, surf, sunbathe and of course eat and drink. Directly in the city and well worth a visit at any time of the year. It is very big and if you plan to meet someone there make sure you have a precise location and follow the maps that are situated at every entry point.At different times of the year you will see multiple international sports being played by lots of different locals, multiple games of cricket, football, rugby, softball etc. At one entrance there is an all year round surf site which is well worth finding to watch the surfers display their skills.Multiple eating options from reasonably high end to snack - Of course a number of different beer gardens as well

title: In riva al fiume.
text: Bellissima passeggiata in una bella giornata di dicembre con la famiglia in riva al fiume a dar da mangiare alle papere!

title: Precioso para pasear
text: Es parque es precioso, ademÃ¡s de pasear puedes comer beber tumbarse baÃ±arte y hasta hacer surf... impresionante.Muy cuidado y seguros.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Beautiful place
text: Very beautiful garden clean and big You can sit walk run or ride a bike There is some shops and restaurants and kids area
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Good to walk through. River running through it added sounds and ambience
text: We took S bahn to the garden and walked for over an hour.  Fall colors on leaves added to beauty.  Small waterfall.  Family place.  Did not notice WC.  No food facilities

title: Impresionante jardÃ­n
text: Es un gran paseo que recomiendo hacer si se va a Munich.La paz y los lugares para disfrutar de una buena cerveza al aire libre vale la pena.

title: Flott park
text: Flott opparbeidet park med blomster, severdigheter, elver, vann og smÃ¥ fossefall. Flott sted for piknikk, joggetur, gÃ¥tur etc. Ikke langt fra gamlebyen i MÃ¼nchen.

title: Very beautiful
text: The park is very big, I recommend to rent a bike to go through it. The views are beautiful and it is essential to visit during your stay in Munchen.

title: Relaxing Day
text: The fantastic weather certainly helped but this was perfect for a relaxation day on our fairly hectic and full on holiday

title: Beautiful and vast
text: You can get to this garden by walking to the north east corner of the Hofgarten behind the Residenz museum, and then just follow the people on the pathway that leads through a short tunnel into the south end of the garden. Check out the surfers on the South East corner before heading further into the garden.  It is huge so give yourself plenty of time and daylight to enjoy it.  I arrived too close to sunset but it seems a lot of people come in to enjoy the sunset from the Monopteros so it did feel safe.

title: for a walk
text: i love to walk in the weekends in the garden with my dog, nice place for families too. i recommend very much

title: Impressionante e enorme no coraÃ§Ã£o da cidade
text: Parque super limpo, no outono Ã© um cenÃ¡rio de tirar o fÃ´lego, aproveite para ver os surfistas de Munique, alugue uma bicicleta para poder conhecer todo o parque, mas fique atento com as placas aonde pode vc pode andar com bike e patinete.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Beautiful autumn walk
text: The garden / park is very big. We were there in the autumn. Autumn colours were lovely. Strolling in the English garden is one of the free things to do in Munich.

title: Vacker park!
text: Fantastisk stor park mitt i city. Vi var dÃ¤r i November och att fÃ¥ avnjuta en varm glÃ¼hwein i parken var supermysigt. Vi avslutade i det charmiga fiket med skidgondoler.

title: Wonderful Park to Stroll
text: I had been here before and it did not disappoint. Gorgeous park full of life. Lovely fall foliage and bustling with people and dogs on this perfect fall day. The fast flowing river that runs throughout and the host of swans and ducks makes it a perfect afternoon resting spot. Be aware there will be some nude sunbathers If the weather is suitable but that adds to the adventure. Make your way over to the surfing bridge to be amazed by their talents , itâ€™s quite a show!

title: Beautiful park, very safe
text: Leaves were turning and it was so beautiful. Streams running through the forest. Super safe, the concierge at hotel laughed at me when I asked if it's safe to go walking in the park by myself. Strongly recommend for a quiet escape while traveling.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Reminds me of NYC's Central Park
text: The English Garden reminds me a bit of Central Park in NYC.  It is a large park area with walking trails, plenty of picnic space, playgrounds, a place to rent paddle boats, restaurants, and even an opportunity to surf (or watch surfing) in a section of the water ways in the park.  You can go in the water in multiple areas of the park as well.  I personally go to the garden to do my morning runs around the trails.

title: Wonderful early morning walk
text: I had a business meeting in Koningstrasse and decided to have an early morning walk through the park to get there. What a beautiful park! It was lovely to see locals making the most of it. From the surfers (yes surfers!) , to someone practising making very big bubbles, people sitting on the river reading, cyclists, runners . The colours of the trees were spectacular. It was made more magical by the mist hanging over the park. We really enjoyed it, it is a very special place.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: lovely walk
text: a calm interlude in the midst of the bustling city. food and drink vendors available. zero litter and totally safe.

title: Enorme.
text: Primavera y verano, debe ser la mejor Ã©poca para recorrerlo. AÃºn asÃ­ el surf no descansa. Habia un buen grupo "cogiendo olas". Lo siento, lo que tengo es un video. Genial.

title: Take your time.
text: The Englisher Garten (English Garden) in Munich is the largest city park in Europe.So if you want to visit the park including one of the restaurants and / or Biergartens, you need at least several hours.The most important sights in the park are a Chinese pagoda, a Japanese tea house, the Monopteros temple and also two Biergartens.The garden opened by the end of the 18th century.The name English Garden refers to the landscape style in which the garden is designed; it is a rather informal garden laid out in a style that was very popular in England during the late 18th and early 19th centuries.The park is larger than Central Park in New York and is divided into two sections: the Hirschau, the northern section is 3 kilometers long and the southern section is 2 kilometers long.The southern part is the busiest part of the park while the Hirschau is much quieter.

title: Mil from the Gong
text: Autumns not the best time to view the flowers but it's still a great place to stroll though, rest or recuperate. There's always something of interest going on and it's near to many points of interest.

title: Sehr schÃ¶ner Park
text: Wir haben den Park besucht. Den Chinesichen Turm angesehen und die Surfer. Echt sehr schÃ¶n der Park und vor allem sehr groÃŸ.

title: Delightfully relaxing
text: Walking from Haupfbanhoff to the English Garden is a great idea to see the sights and reach a beautifully manicured green and lush garden where you can stroll and relax for hours.

title: Nice Park to Visit
text: Very nice park to visit to walk through, several extremely nice restaurants and patios for lunch and dinner.  If you have the time, very nice walk and dinner

title: Un INCANTO NEL CUORE DI UNA CITTÃ€
text: ho passato tre giorni a Monaco e quasi uno per intero nel giardino inglese.Si puÃ² percorrere con le bici a disposizione di Uber e lo consiglio perche tutto a piedi vi ruberebbe troppo tempo e le attrazioni all interno sono varie.Dallo spot dei surfisti, cosa da non perdere, al monopteros a tutta la zona dove ci sono distese immense di verde e ponti e punti del fiume caratteristici e suggestivi.

title: Breathtaking
text: Vast open spaces with hundreds of people swimming, drinking and just enjoying the sunshine was the site that greeted us when we stumbled upon this magnificent area. The Chinese tower and adjacent beer garden was a fantastic spot to enjoy a few drinks and a great meal, this would have to be the best park that I've seen and can't wait to visit again.

title: Beautiful Park
text: I was amazed at how large the English Gardens were.  Lots of paths for walking or biking or just strolling to enjoy nature.  We were there on a beautiful autumn day and the trees were so colorful.  The Chinese tower is surrounded by a huge beer garden.  After lots of walking and exploring there is nothing better than enjoying a beer!

title: GrÃ¼ne Lunge MÃ¼nchens
text: Der englische Garten bietet viele FreizeitmÃ¶glichkeiten. Spazieren gehen, Ball spielen auf den groÃŸen Wiesen, im Baumschatten lesen, radeln, picknicken, im Eisbach schwimmen (der macht seinem Namen allerdings alle Ehre...), BiergÃ¤rten wie das Seehaus oder am chinesischen Turm, oder aber FrÃ¤ulein GrÃ¼neis, Surfern auf der Eisbachwelle zuschauen (ganz im SÃ¼den), tolle Ausblicke vom Monopterus, FFK im sÃ¼dlichen Teil und ruhigere und wildwÃ¼chsigere Wiesen und BÃ¤ume im nÃ¶rdlichen Teil.

title: MÃ¼thiÅŸ
text: Åehrin gÃ¶beÄŸinde kendinizi daÄŸlarda hissedebileceÄŸiniz Ã§ok bÃ¼yÃ¼k ve yemyeÅŸil bir alan. Ã–zellikle havalarÄ±n iyi olduÄŸu zamanlarda tÃ¼m gÃ¼nÃ¼nÃ¼zÃ¼ burada dinlenerek geÃ§irebilirsiniz. Suyun ve yeÅŸilin mÃ¼thiÅŸ buluÅŸmasÄ±.

title: WeitlÃ¤ufig und wunderschÃ¶n
text: Obwohl die BÃ¤ume bei unserem Besuch noch alle kahl waren haben wir den Spaziergang bei tollstem Sonnenschein genossen. Der Besuch lohnt sich.

title: Das Besondere am Englischen Garten - immer wieder gerne
text: Aus der Sicht einer MÃ¼nchnerin.Es ist nicht nur ein "Garten" - er ist Ausdruck der MÃ¼nchner Lebensart "Leben und Leben lassen".Ein Genuss, der Blick vom Monopterus zu den Kirchen der Innenstadt - Studium der Hunderassen mit seinen Besitzern - gleich am Haus der Kunst die Surfer im Eisbach - ein kÃ¼hles Bier im Sommer, ein Brunch im Winter im Seehaus - oder ab in die Natur - nach dem Seehaus Richtung Norden km-lange Wanderung mit Einkehrschwung mÃ¶glich.

title: best place in Munich
text: it was cold & cloudy but I will still rate this as the best place during my whole trip in Munich. so beautiful & colourful. Autumn was nearly perfect in this garden. don't miss it.

title: prachtige tuin
text: Dichtbij het centrum van MÃ¼nchen kun je even aan het stadsgeweld ontsnappen met een mooie wandeling in dit prachtige park.  Goed bereikbaar via meerdere metro stations.

title: EspaÃ§o livre para todos

title: Still beautiful on a blustery, October day
text: I don't believe we got the "full effect", as our visit was on a chilly October day, but this is still a lovely walk in any weather and I can see where it would be in its full glory in the warmer months.  Even on an overcast day, it was a quiet, calm place in a bustling city.  Friendly younger people with dogs and the older crowd playing bocce ball made for a feeling of this really being a "local" retreat.  Will visit again in the summer!!

title: ImperdÃ­vel!!
text: O Parque Ã© enorme. VocÃª pode visitÃ¡-lo ao longo da sua estadia em Munique. Muito legal para fazer atividade fÃ­sica, um piquenique, nadar (se vocÃª tiver coragem de encarar a Ã¡gua bem fria, mesmo no verÃ£o) ou atÃ© mesmo surfar. A  Biergarten foi a minha parte favorita do parque: vÃ¡rias mesas de madeira compridas, boas cervejas, petiscos tÃ­picos alemÃ£es e mÃºsica alemÃ£!!! De lÃ¡ caminhamos pelo parque e voltamos a pÃ© atÃ© a Odeonsplatz, Ã© uma caminhada longa, mas vale a pena e te permite conhecer melhor o Englischer garten.

title: Boa opÃ§Ã£o para caminhar.
text: O parque Ã© lindo e grande! Ã“timo para as crianÃ§as correrem. Tem parquinhos tambÃ©m, restaurantes. A torre chinesa Ã© linda e, no domingo que fomos lÃ¡, tinha uma banda tocando. Lugar perfeito para sentar, ouvir mÃºsica e tomar uma cerveja.

title: one of the most beautiful city parks around the world, to me
text: You can stroll around for hours, enjoying the nature, along the Isar river, or sit in a restaurant near the Chinese Tower. Another highlight is the "Haus der Kunst", an art museum. - The City Center is just 15 minutes walking from here.

title: Bel parco
text: Parco bello, grande, ben tenuto, con particolari interessanti, quali i surfisti sulle piccole rapide dei fiumi, la pagoda e i ristoranti al centro del parco.

title: The largest central park of the world
text: Thatâ€™s the largest central park of the world. The english garden have 2 parts. The younger part have the chines tower, the sea house. The eisbach. The older part of the English garden is much bigger and not so much tourists. Very amazing place.

title: Spaziergang
text: WunderschÃ¶n zum Joggen und Spazieren gehen.Der Englische Garten ist abwechslungsreich, da viele verschiedene BÃ¤ume wachsen. Es gibt mehrere Wege fÃ¼r FuÃŸgÃ¤nger und Radfahrer getrennt.Auch Gehbehinderte kÃ¶nnen ihn genieÃŸen, da alle Wege ebenerdig sind.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: MÃ¼nchner Central Park
text: WeitlÃ¤ufige Anlage, perfekt fÃ¼r einen ausgedehnten Spaziergang. Direkt zu Beginn wartet die Eisbach Welle, hier kann man bereits lange verweilen und den Surfern zusehen. Wirklich spektakulÃ¤r Nach ner Weile noch vor dem chinesischen Turm kommt eine groÃŸe FlÃ¤che wo jedermann sich bei sommerlichen Temperaturen abkÃ¼hlen kann. Eigentlich verboten - wird aber geduldet. Die Polizei war zahlreich vertreten - zu Pferd und mit Auto.Aber Eisbach, der Name ist auch Programm. Hier trifft sich gefÃ¼hlt ganz MÃ¼nchen zur AbkÃ¼hlung und zum sonnen.In jedem Fall Badesachen einpacken.Wer keine eigene Brotzeit dabei hat. Am chinesischen Turm gibt's unter schattigen BÃ¤umen, das Ã¼bliche MÃ¼nchner Programm. Blasmusik, Haxen, Weisswurst, Obazda & Co.SchÃ¶n ist das historische Kinderkarussell mit Ã¼ber 100 Jahren auf dem Buckel.Im englischen Garten kann man getrost einen Tag verbringen und die Seele baumeln lassen. Ich fand es schÃ¶ner als jeden Central Park Besuch in NYC

title: Beautiful walk
text: Great way to spend a quiet afternoon walking through these lovely landscapes. The biergarten near the Japanese tower has a very good selection of food and drinks in a pretty setting.

title: A real asset to Munich
text: In a busy city or after a visit to Dachau, this is a great place to decompress. It is a wonderful urban park, accessible from several sides. It is not far from the well beaten path and a perfect place to stop for awhile.

title: English Garten
text: Had a great time. Went thru park on E/bikes!  Stopped for lunch and continued thru the lovely paths along the river in the garden.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Un Ã©norme parc, plus grand que le Central Park de New York
text: Le Englische Garten sÃ©duit avec une surface plus grande que le Central Park new-yorkais et sâ€™Ã©tend donc sur presque 4km2. Essentiellement couvert de pelouse, mais bordÃ© dâ€™arbres on sâ€™y voit parfaitement faire un footing et du vÃ©lo. Il ne sâ€™agit pas dâ€™un parc botanique par contre, donc nâ€™espÃ©rez pas dâ€™avoir des explications sur les plantes ou des espÃ¨ces dâ€™arbres extravagants. Ã€ voir quand mÃªme et facilement combinable avec la Eisbachwelle situÃ©e cÃ´tÃ© Prinzregentenstrasse.

title: Passeggiata nel parco
text: Questo parco non ha niente da invidiare ai piÃ¹ grandi parchi urbani, merita sicuramente una passeggiata! Giardino immenso, con tanto verde, laghi, zone per rilassarsi e localini. Tappa obbligatoria

title: Eine Oase der Ruhe
text: Selbst wenn halb MÃ¼nchen durch den Park lustwandelt, fÃ¼hlt man sich nie wirklich eingeengt. Der Park ist einfach zu gross und zu schÃ¶n. Zu jeder Jahreszeit. Wir mÃ¶gen einen sonnigen Herbsttag am liebsten. Danach ein Bier beim chinesischen Turm und die Welt ist wieder in Ordnung.

title: Perfekt tur i parken
text: En fantastisk park som har alt du trenger, fra en park. Fin, godt opparbeidet, ulike steder for pauser, elver, smÃ¥ fossefall, surfing. Og milevis med veier.

title: Wundervoller Park
text: Hier kann man gut Spazieren gehen und die Natur genieÃŸen. So einen schÃ¶nen Park hatten wir in MÃ¼nchen nicht erwartet.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Verde e cani liberi
text: Passeggiata di una mezza giornata, ma ne servirebbe una intera per visitarlo tutti per bene. Zone per i giochi dei bambini recintate, prati per giocare con i cani, animali selvatici facilmente osservabili. Da vedere!

title: Un trÃ¨s belle promenade
text: Assez central dans la ville vous ne pourrez pas y Ã©chapper.On peut y trouver proche de lâ€™ambassade des USA, un morceau du mur de Berlin.Le jardin est accessible et on peut sâ€™y promener en vÃ©lo.

title: Parque Enorme
text: Lugar para ser visitado no verÃ£o, parque com mais de 15km (isso mesmo) de comprimento. No verÃ£o esse parque ferve de gente para tomar sol (as vezes nus) , andar de bicicleta, comer e beber nos vÃ¡rios biergartens, se jogar no rio e deixar a correnteza te lavar por vÃ¡rios quilÃ´metros.

title: Muy bonito
text: Es un sitio sÃºper grande y muy agradable para pasear en bici o caminando , yo cuando llegue oscureciÃ³ enseguida porque llegue tarde asÃ­ que recomiendo ir por la maÃ±ana

title: DISAPPOINTED!!!
text: We were expecting to see areas of beautiful flowers.  But NONE.Many people laying on blankets on green grass having a picnic.Many people jogging or walking the trails.  Plus many jogging or walking with their dogs.One area--the Chinese Garden--was a HUGE Beer Garden.With Many Food Booths and BEER Booths.  Picnic tables everywhere.  People visiting and drinking BEER.

title: Ein Tag im Englischen Garten mit dem Radl
text: Wie kann man schÃ¶ner einen sonnigen Herbsttag genieÃŸen, als mit der Familie mit dem Radl in den Englischen Garten zu fahren. Selbst in den kÃ¼hleren Monaten im Herbst ist es immer noch ein tolles Erlebnis. Am schÃ¶nsten ist es dort aber definitiv im Sommer! Radeln, baden, Picknick, FuÃŸball oder Frisbee spielen... oder am Chinesischen Turm ein paar Mass in einem der BiergÃ¤rten trinken...Der Central Park von MÃ¼nchen. Definitiv empfehlenswert!

title: Try delicious chicken;)
text: Actually the most remembered thing will be the extremely delicious chicken buffets located in the middle of the gardens. The park was giant and well preserved. Itâ€™s really nice to have park this big in the middle of the city. Lucky muncheners!

title: Very relaxed
text: Really relaxed atmosphere, suitable for families, couples, groups etc.Good food, drinks and we were lucky enough to be there for a live band!

title: Amazing park in the heart of Munich
text: Even you are in a big city you feel that you are in a forest if you visit the English Garden. The water (lake and small revers), the trees, and the whole surrounding is an ideal place to relax. Don't miss it if you visit Munich.

title: Couldn't Find the Gardens
text: We made a special trip to this area to see the "English Gardens" but we never did find  them.  What we did find instead was a huge, green, treed park in the middle of the city.  Be sure to find those surfers, not what we expected to see, but great fun to watch.  I'm not sure why this park is identified as a garden because they don't have any.  We spent the afternoon looking for them, only to be told by a local employee that the park was the garden.

title: Chill and peaceful
text: It's good for travellers that want chilling a day in the park this would be great idea to visit the park for breathe the grass and trees.

title: Eine einzigartige Parkanlage
text: Hingehen,  spazieren, Bier trinken, Surfer beobachten,  Essen. Fehlt was? Nein. Ein Erlebnis pur. Tolle Stadt und neidisch bin ich. Wie schÃ¶n eine Stadt sein kann, zeigt der englische Garten.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: A lovely afternoon
text: Stunning park with a great atmosphere. We visited on a sunny afternoon and the park was really busy but still very relaxing. Sadly there was no surfing that day. The beer garden was packed but had such a good atmosphere. Watch out for cyclists though who go a little too fast given the amount of people on the paths. A must!

title: Un oasis en la ciudad
text: Hermoso. Relajante. Para un paseo por el verde, disfrutando la naturaleza. Se merece aunque sea un pequeÃ±o recorrido.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: ImperdÃ­vel
text: O Parque Ã© gigantesco, recomendo alugar uma bike ou um carrinho dentro do prÃ³prio parque para conhecÃª-lo inteiro. O parque tem vÃ¡rias atraÃ§Ãµes, jardins, rio, cervejarias, monumentos e as eisbach wave, aquele lugar onde os surfistas fazem manobras insanas num rio. AtraÃ§Ã£o para a famÃ­lia toda.

title: Beautiful park
text: A great day out in the center of Munich. If there is a nice day itâ€™s absolute a must to walk across the park. Beautiful landscape and nice coffee spots

title: Groot park
text: De Engelse tuin in MÃ¼nchen is een van de grootste parken van Europa. Het is groter dan Central Park in New York. Erg mooi aangelegd en zeer de moeite waard. Wij hebben met de fiets het park doorkruist want het is echt groot. Veel mensen die er wandelen genieten en zonnebaden. Het park stamt uit de 18e eeuw en heeft behalve veel bomen planten en natuur onder andere een Chinese toren, een Japans theehuis en tempel in Griekse stijl. Aanrader om hier te wandelen, te fietsen en te genieten.

title: Buntes Treiben im englischen Garten
text: Viele AktivitÃ¤ten, ob Jung, ob Alt, es herrscht ein buntes Treiben. Eine Gruppe von Trommlern, das hat mich sehr beeindruckt und junge Leute, die nach Harry Potter Manier ihre BÃ¤lle Ã¼bers Feld gespielt haben.  So viele Menschen, die einfach nur den letzten lauen Abend drauÃŸen genossen haben. Die Stimmung war wunderschÃ¶n.

title: a lovely green of munich
text: king ludwig II always appreciated international architecture...loved adding those into his territory. english garden is one, a reflection of hyde park of london. it could have been more creative but i found it pretty plain.

title: Paradise
text: If youâ€™re looking to relax, go for a jog, meditate, or just appreciate nature this is the place for you. Itâ€™s such a beautiful landscape of trees and ponds that will reignite your appreciation for nature. Take a walk and just breathe in all the goodness this place has to offer. Give yourself enough time to relax and enjoy.

title: Truly lovely
text: Lovely grounds to walk, enjoy a band, great biergarten and area to paddleboat. One the best locations to quietly enjoy time with family.

title: Amazing open area for beer and food
text: Visited the English garden on Sunday evening and had a great beer and pretzel. Listened to a Traditional German band playing from the Chinesischer Turm and had a very good time. Lots of people also enjoying the evening.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Beautiful outdoor space
text: Also a really great space to spend time outdoors in Munich.   Lots of room to walk and explore and several beer gardens.  I'm told in the Christmas season you can find a nice market here near the Chinese tower

title: must visit in Munich
text: Incredibly beautiful place ! When you step in you are in a different world ! Peaceful place to spend some quality time

title: Lovely green space for walk/fresh air
text: Although we went at the â€œwrongâ€ season (October), this still gave us a great opportunity to take a lovely stroll in the park with trees turning lovely golden all around. Nice place to relax and take some fresh air.

title: OMG this 'garden' is huge!
text: The hotel said it would be about a 20 minute walk from Rosenheimer Platz to the Englischer Garten.  It took us forever because I have mobility issues and the area surrounding the garden is extensive.  Then when one arrives at the actual garden where all the sunbathers are en masse it's nearly 45 minutes.  Especially walking in the hot sun when we were visiting. But gosh it is a lovely walk.  Rivers, bridges, foliage with turning leaves, loads and loads of expansive greenery and statues.  Even surfing! What a treat!

title: O mais bacana Ã© o surf no rio ...
text: O mais bacana Ã© o surf no rio ... curioso como junta gente para ver os surfistas de no rio. O complexo de jardins Ã© muito bacana, vale a pena um volta. Tudo Ã© muito bonito e organizado nessa cidade .. mesmo na Ã©poca de festas.

title: Visited as part of a bike tour; great lunch at the Chinese Pavilion
text: River surfing was really interesting.  Good, hearty lunch, enough food for two or three persons! Roast Chicken and Frikadeller were super; excellent beers.

title: Le poumon vert de Munich
text: Immense (pour les parisiens, habituÃ©s aux parcs dont la circonfÃ©rence dÃ©passe Ã  peine le kilomÃ¨tre...), ce joli jardin permet d'oublier la ville... sans la quitter.

title: Easy to get lost
text: Very beautiful garden but not too many Signes to tell the way in and about. We found a Lovely beergarden in the middle. But to find the subway  was almost inpossible.

title: Giardino pubblico top
text: Bel giardino pubblico con tanto verde, attrazioni e localini. Piacevole scoperta al centro di Monaco

title: Beautiful Park Garden
text: My friend that resides in Munich took me to the English Garden. I was expecting totally different. I absolutely loved the park, the garden, the gazebo everything was just beautiful.

title: A real MUST  for anyone loving to get lost into this huge lane& trees
text: just outside the university of munich leave at least  half a day , espacially on a sunny one .recommend to start from the upper north point reachable by the u6 . strolling down until you reach the Residenz garden will lead you through

Tiene lagos hermosos y un rÃ­o angosto que corre muy rÃ¡pido lo que le da la peculiaridad de que en Ã©l hagan surf. Tiene zonas despejadas en la que se conforman claros y otras zonas con vegetaciÃ³n frondosa. reitero que requiere de mucho tiempo si se lo quiere recorrer todo.

title: Cool place
text: Cool and quiet place, a lot of walking needed to see it. Perfect time to can take a rest. We had really nice time there.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Donâ€™t skip this while in Munich
text: Absolutely loved English Garden and so glad we took the time to visit while in Munich.  We walked through the park on a Sunday and stopped at two of the mini beer gardens and watched the surfers in the river.  The park is very large and very beautiful.  The beer gardens were beautiful and showed the awesome Bavarian culture (and awesome food).The river surfing was also very cool.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: SchÃ¶n und wirklich grÃ¼n :-)
text: Einer der schÃ¶nsten Parks der Stadt.Monopteros und Chinesischer Turm. Seehaus und die vielen Enten.Wunderbar!

title: Amazing open space in central Munich
text: Central Park is all well and good if you live in NYC, but there are several features of Munich's massive city center park that NY will never touch:>>>>Three of Munich's best Bier Gartens -- including the three largest in the worldAcres and acres of mown grass on which to play frisbee or watch the water flow past on a beautiful day.>>>>>A "surfing buch" artificial surfing place built into one of the canals through the park.   Get close up views of some very impressive surfers.>>>>A large field where nudism is allowed and even protected, though not from hordes of gaping tourists (and amazingly invasive picture takers.)  Avoid the gawkers by going to the center or take a turn shocking them on the periphery.>>>>A herd of sheep (if you go far enough away from downtown).  Grass guzzling animals are a whole lot cheaper than gas guzzling mowers>>>>A "Chinese" tower and a "Greek Temple" >>>>Pedalcabs that while whisk you through the highlights for a fistful of EurosRolling ice cream vendors (OK, Central Park has those too, but the ice cream seems to taste better here.)----->>>>  Safety note.  The English Garden is safer than Central Park at almost any time of day.   The southern (downtown side) is generally safe at night, but the upper reaches of the park can be dicey after dark.  Still assaults are rare enough to be front page news when they do, and you won't get shot..

title: Bei tollem Wetter - einfach schÃ¶n

title: Wonderful walk at the park
text: English Garden is beautiful throughout the year - cold warm rainy or dry it has its character! We have been there in cold and foggy weather , it was nostalgic and so winter vibe, and recently in October with 20 degrees nice walk , beer and nice cigar ...in any occasion this park welcomes you and people love to hang out here

title: Gran plan

title: Lovely place for an autumn walk
text: Beautiful gardens with lots of well looked after paths to potter along. The autumn colours now are really beautiful and there are plenty of ducks and other birds to enjoy. I saw a little cafe which looked nice so I guess you can get a drink and a piece of cake but I didn't try it out.

title: Huge park
text: We went on Saturday, after we found free parking space we started exploring the area near the lake were there is plenty of ducts, dine at Seehaus, walk the wide green spaces and lush trees started changing into autumn colors, kindly chilly, many people relaxing, haven't seen any naked people since it was chilly and cloudy. Passing by the famous beer garden on our way to the surfing area which was unfortunately closed but still people stayed to relax watching slow moving stream. I would definitely go back here during summer.

title: bellissima esperienza

title: Som en mindre svensk stad
text: Denna park Ã¤r enorm. Man kan vandra i timmar lÃ¤ngs smÃ¥ vattenstrÃ¶mmar eller i ren skog. Gigantiska grÃ¤sytor lockar MÃ¼nchenborna, inte minst pÃ¥ helgerna. SjÃ¶ med trampbÃ¥tar fÃ¶r familjer eller par. Och sÃ¥ klart; restauranger och Biergartens fÃ¶r den hungrige och tÃ¶rstige. Missa inte den konstgjorda surfingvÃ¥gen i sydÃ¶stra hÃ¶rnet!

title: Lovely afternoon in the gardens
text: Spent whole afternoon in the gardens and as it was october the autumn colours were amazing. The park is huge so to make sure we saw everything we hired some electric scooters which were a huge hit with my sons - we could not possibly have covered all we did without them . Would recommend a visit here .

title: Beautiful and astoningly big garden
text: If you want to get a glimpse of "real" Munich - well, then you have to go there. Starting close to the very city centre and reaching up along Isar river to the north end of Munich it offers a variety seldom seen elsewhere. Surfers riding a standing wave next to Haus der Kunst, nudist enjoying the sun, a fantastic beer garden under a historic pagoda, vast meadows, even hunting the game...

title: Well established tradition
text: Very pleasant walking, large picnic spaces, beer gardens, peddle boats on the lake and hundreds of passersby, dog walking, cycling; it's all there and worth a visit. Access by public transit, parking nearby, Christmas market in December....

title: Lovely park
text: Well worth it to take a walk from hofgarten to the eisbachwelle. From there if you're too tired to walk back to marienplatz,  you could take tram 16 .
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Must see
text: Love this place. Huge public park with a food market in the middle that serves beer. You can even buy a beer stein if you want. Gets crowded and the whole operation can seem like a machine (not much time to ask questions given the number of people coming in and out) but well worth it overall, even if just to walk through. Need a sweater or good jacket if youâ€™re going in the fall/autumn.

title: Beautiful and peaceful!
text: Beautiful Garden in the middle of Munich.  Feels like you are not even in the city!  Visit the restaurant area for lunch and a beer.  Music was playing by a band while we were there too!

title: an oasis
text: we both walked through this then rented bikes a day later and rode the length of the Garden.  Beautiful.  2 rivers one of which featured river surfing and a nice small lake.  Safe and delightful.

title: Meraviglioso giardino infinito
text: Prima volta che siamo riusciti ad andare a rilassarci in questo giardino: bellissimo, silenziosissimo, e spero di tornare e passare una giornata intera godendo di tutto ciÃ² che offre: pace, tranquillitÃ , cibo, lago e tanto, tanto tantissimo verde curatissimo!!!

title: Beautiful and relaxing
text: This is a must visit location in Munich. The landscape and environment is gorgeous and easily walkable. There are many benches available for sitting to watch ducks, waterfalls, etc.  Just a beautiful and serene green space to enjoy in the middle of the bustling city. Really puts Central Park to shame

title: La natura in cittÃ
text: Davvero bello il parco, spazi verdi, alberi e un fiume che scorre fanno di questo parco una oasi naturale nel centro della cittÃ

title: Great fun
text: The gardens are beautiful.  Well worth the time just to see the surfers!  The beer garden was not open while we were there, but still worth the trip.

title: Enormous park, needs more signs
text: Bigger than Central Park and a really nice space. There is a lake to go rowing on, A beer garden in the middle and masses of paths to walk on. There are a few "you are here" signs but there needs to be a lot more. Due to its size, you can be heading in the wrong direction for quite some time (as we did). The people surfing the canal are at the very southern tip of the garden.

title: Surf and turf
text: What a beautiful few steps (5 min walk) from busy town centre. There was a river, surfing folks and a big field to relax on...even super friendly geese.A very pretty place, well on a par with central park new York.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Huge
text: English Garden is an inevitable inclusion in any tourist itinerary of the city. Not surprising when you visit it - big, with several interesting spots (beer garden, Chinese tower, surfing spot et al, Monopteros) and friendly locals...

title: Not really a pedestrian tourist attraction
text: I say that because it's very large place and you really need a bicycle and several hours to explore it properly. Yes, there are a few attractions that you can walk to from the city center at the southern edge of the park. However, the original purpose was to give harried city dwellers a place to decompress. If you're burned out from several days of museum touring, this could be the antidote. However, I'm not sure it merits a visit all on its own (other than to see the Eisbachwelle surf break, Chinese Tower beer garden, etc.).

title: Oasi di pace
text: Bello il contesto, un angolo di paradiso in una grande cittÃ  come Monaco di Baviera..suggestivi i corsi d'acqua specie dove alcuni spericolati praticano surf, in cui la corrente dell'acqua Ã¨ davvero forte..e sarÃ  pure fredda..! Si puÃ² anche gustare un'ottima birra con varie pietanze tipiche presso il ristorante self-service presente all'interno del parco.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Perfect for a sunny afternoon
text: We made our way over here during one of our last days in Munich, just to explore and pass some time before heading back to Oktoberfest. It turned out to be a perfect spot to relax, soak up some sun, and essentially detox after a long previous night. Next time, we'll have to remember a towel so we can cool off in the river.

title: Stunning parkland scenery and lake
text: Definitely recommend, especially on a sunny day. The park is absolutely huge and there is a lot to see while wandering around. There are little bridges scattered around that go over the river and streams that flow through the park. It really is lovely to walk around. Definitely recommend seeing eisbach - a unique area of the manmade river in the park where local surfers come to surf the waves on the river (yes waves). It takes about 30 minutes to walk to the other side of the park so it could easily take 1.5 hours to walk the park in a circle as there are so many lovely paths.If you don't fancy walking for that long, you can rent a bike or use one of the electric scooters scattered around the paths via an app by Companies such as  Lime, Jump (Uber), Bird or Tier. A great spot for wildlife enthusiasts as well as there are waterfowl, mole hills and friendly dogs being walked throughout.Horse and cart rides were frequent the day that we were there. There is also a few great restaurants up on the North side of the park beside the lake.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Mooi park
text: Heel leuk park, erg groot. Leuk om rond te lopen. De surfers zij  leuk om te zien. Het restaurant is echter vreselijk, heel druk, echt een vreetschuur met stinkend vet.

title: Bike or walk
text: It's lovely, only a little further than the Residenz. Has vast green areas, willows over water, swans, forested paths.

title: Me encanto!!!!
text: Muy bonito parque,con un rÃ­o que hace que te puedas dar un baÃ±o con cascada muy verde y con patos paseando tranquilamente me gusto mucho un gran pulmÃ³n para la ciudad,se puede hacer un picnic...tomar cervezas.....

title: Biergarten Hirschau authentische Gastronomie
text: Breites Angebot an typischen Speisen und GetrÃ¤nken zu fairen Preisen.Freundlich, schnell und herzlich. GemÃ¼tlich und Kinderfreundlich.

title: wonderful
text: One of the nicest public parks Iâ€™ve ever been to, with a couple of amazing features. Foremost is the Chinese Tower beer garden, where we had lunch and a welcome break. Second are the areas where you can watch surfers practicing their sport. And third is the people watching. Definitely a great place to visit in Munich.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Brilliant
text: Lovely park, with exceptional walk paths.One should take 4 hours out, roam around for an hour, then head to the beer garden at the Chinese tower, and spend two hours there and walk back satisfied.A few buses stop at the Chinese tower as well.Worth every moment spent here..
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Beautiful - must see
text: This garden / park was a highlight of my visit to Munich. Beautiful, clean, walk or push bike through. Definitely go and watch the river surfers. Brilliant. Falls also good for swimming. Germans are very open to nudity so you may see some nude sun bathers

title: Erg mooi
text: Deel van het park bezocht. Mooi en ruim. Wat ons met name opviel was hoe snel het water stroomde.De paden zijn goed toegankelijk en op de velden laten mensen hun honden uit of zijn scoutinggroepen bezig.

title: A beautiful day out
text: I would highly recommend a full part of a day to visit this garden - it reminds me of NYC Central Park. Itâ€™s huge and so beautiful with plenty of walking tracks & little food stops along the way.

title: Polmone verde
text: Ho percorso quasi 6 km all'interno del parco, sia prima sia dopo la Chinesicher Turm. Ottimo per fare jogging e respirare un po' di aria fresca e pulita. Bello il fiume che scorre all'interno del parco, simpatica la famosa postazione da surf.

title: Very expansive and well maintained
text: we took a bike tour and rode through a portion of the gardens and it was great, very well done and worth a few hours to get away from it all.

title: Central Park of Munich
text: Something for everybody, the green lung of Munich, traditonal and hip, healthy and chilly, for lovers, sportives and families.

title: Must see in Munich
text: Wunderbarer groÃŸer Park, lÃ¤d ein einem schÃ¶nen Herbsttag zum Verweilen ein. Unbedingt noch im Biergarten einkehren.

title: Beautiful Park
text: We enjoyed our relaxing walk through the Englisher Garden.Watching the surfers at the Eisbachwelle (river surfing) was also very interesting. We eventually walked to the beer garden and also enjoyed sitting and having a beer and a bite to eat.A very enjoyable afternoon.

title: Unusual place to watch surfers
text: The gardens are big and beautiful - we walked to the beer garden and had a great lunch before walking to watch the surfers.  We were surprised at how many surfers were actually there - quite unusual to see them in the middle of as busy city.

title: River Surfing
text: A vast area of land, with a meandering river throughout. At the end is a via duct where residents actually use surf boards on the river. It was absolutely amazing since the river was running high and fast.

title: You could easily spend 2 days here
text: It's far from just a garden, it's an absolutely huge area that goes on and on, that is peaceful, easy to walk, clean with beautifully manicured gardens. It's a beautiful way to leave the city, without leaving the city. Think of Central Park but bigger. A fantastic free attraction, just wear good walking shoes, you'll need them.

title: Enjoyable peaceful experience
text: We rented bikes and went through the gardens. There could be better signage as we did get lost a few times, but loved the beer gardens.

title: Natureza sublime!
text: Um parque apaixonante, imagine poder surfar no centro da cidade, nesse parque isso e possÃ­vel. Ã“timo para caminhadas e lazer.

title: these gardens are very english with box hedges
text: It was pouring with rain but we still managed to shiver our way around these gardens. You can walk to them from the Platz.

title: Beautiful green area
text: This garden is huge.It is a green area for lots of activities. You can just hang out lying in the grass, ride a bike, go for a walk or a run, organize some team sports ..... you can really do anything you want because it is very spacious.Very peaceful place to spend some time.Right next to Hofgarten.Worth the visit.

title: WunderschÃ¶ner Ort
text: Bin immer wieder gerne dort.Einfach ein schÃ¶ner Ort zum Abschalten!Bin dort gerne unterwegs mit Freunden oder mit meinem Partner!

title: Unbedingt empfehlenswert

title: One of the biggest of its kind
text: The park is really huge, beer house inside is quite nice. I visited at the time of Octoberfest and it was like a small Octoberfest at the beer house after all.

title: beautiful place
text: We took a long walk. Along the stream, past the Monopteros to the bridge on the Eisbach and there we watched the surfers.Wonderful on this glorious hot summer day.

title: No English in the English Garden!
text: Wonderful gardens - a great park - what I didnâ€™t expect was the signs had no English, except the beer garden.  The park is huge.  A pedi-cab was a convenient way to get around and he spoke English.  Go - itâ€™s great - just be prepared.

title: Must see
text: One of the greatest botanical gardens in the world is a really a treat to the sore eyesIt's historic significance and also scientific values are worth the effort

title: Central Park aus MÃ¼nchen
text: Erholung in der Grossstadt, viele Facetten. Immer was los, aber nie Ã¼berlaufen. FÃ¼r groÃŸ und klein eine Erholung!

title: A bit of everything in a garden!
text: These gardens are easily located from the city centre...and if you want to avoid public transport, they are an easy and interesting walk away. There are wide expanses of lawn, plenty of places to sit and people watch and also places where you can buy coffee, alcohol or lunch.The Chinese pagoda seems so out of place to me, but there were plenty of others who seemed to enjoy their visit. The surfers along the canal are definitely worth watching. They have an organised approach to surfing the wave....lots of fun to be had, and noticeable camaraderie amongst surfers and bystanders. It's not Bells Beach but certainly popular.  Bike riding through the gardens makes everything more easily accessible if you have limited time but if you're on foot and have time to spare, spreading your visit over two days  makes for a relaxing and entertaining time.

title: Parque Maravilhoso
text: Vale a pena um super passeio nesse parque com uma Ã¡rea verde enorme, alÃ©m disso tem um "riozinho" que corta ele, e bem na cabeceira dele, tem alguns aventureiros que surfam nele. Muito curioso!

title: Beautiful place to ride a bike!
text: The English Garden is a beautiful place to ride your bike and escape the city streets.  Make certain you stop for a bite to eat and a beer at the next to the Chinese Tower!
