text: Er ist mehr als 200 Jahre alt. Der ist ein hoher Turm in diesem Garten, chinesicher Turm. Er gefÃ¤llt mir so sehr, weil ganz aus Holz ist! Andere Ding ist Monopetros. Das ist ein griechischer Tempel auf einem HÃ¼gel. Willst du diesen Garten besuchen? Dann geh gerade zu dieser PlÃ¤tze zuerst!

title: Bellissimo
text: Un parco bellissimo e caratteristico. Tanto verde, grandissimo, attraversato da un bus di collegamento, tanti bar e tanta gente che fa sport. Lago al centro, 2 punti in cui il corso d'acqua che lo attraversa crea delle mini cascate con onde in cui si pratica surf. Un ristorante self service con 7000 posti a sedere all'aperto e un'orchestra che suona dal vivo.

title: Great afternoon stroll with a nice beer at the end!
text: Great wander in the park, weather great (iPhone said rain?) sunny Saturday afternoon, people sunbathing, watched surfers for a while, and people swimming in very fast flowing river, the walked to Chinese pagoda for a beer in a great beer garden.. great food too.. oh and you catch the bus to & from the beer garden, think it was a 55.... we worth a visit....

title: You could get lost!!
text: These gardens are massive! You really need to get a map to ensure you donâ€™t get lost! Itâ€™s best on a dry/sunny day to make the most of the cafe, walks and the hofbrauhaus. Not much shelter around. It has a beautiful lake and a river flowing through where they surf ğŸ„â€â™‚ï¸ when possible! Beer gets delivered by horse and cart, a fab sight! Highly recommend especially in the summer to get out of the city.

title: Beautiful
text: Huge, beatiful, well maintained city park.  You could spend the whole day hear very easily. An excellent tranquil escape from the busy city. My favourite part was the "Eisbachwelle" which is where there is river surfing. JUst an amazing sight to see.

title: My favorite park!
text: This place is sooooo beautiful! it completely stole my heart! I find it hard to believe there is a park better than this one, i was there for hours in itÂ´s rivers, waterfalls, their surferÂ´s area, lake, beergarden. I only walked to about the middle and there was this clear area where grass was left to grow long and surrounded by trees, breathtakingly gorgeous!!!They have public transportation that runs inside so there are streets, bike, horse and walking paths!!!

title: Ottima passeggiata
text: Polmone verde a Monaco... Ottimo per una bella passeggiata... Pulito e ottimamente tenuto... Da visitare e andare a vedere i bavaresi fare surf sul fiume

title: Relax
text: Bellissimo posto rilassante molto silenzioso esteso.Puoi trascorrere un pomeriggio rilassante tra i giardini fantastici.Passeggiata relax

title: Beautiful gardens
text: Beautiful massive gardens that go on for ages, with a lovely cafe. Check out the surfers if you get time!
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Something for everyone
text: Lovely expansive green space with large centuries old trees. Plenty of space to sun bathe or stroll. The river is very calm in places and in another place so turbulent that you can surf. Will definitely come back.

title: Gorgeous park
text: Unbelievably gorgeous park lovely and green massive beer garden in the middle recommended visiting!!!
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Wonderful park - easy to get lost
text: My husband and I spent several hours wandering the park because we were lost! It truly is a wonderful park, and we would have enjoyed it more if we weren't wandering aimlessly :-)

title: Simply Splendid
text: This was one of the most beautiful gardens I have ever seen. I really wish I got to spend more time there because 3 hours was not enough!I could have spent all day there just wandering around through all the different trails. The architecture was just stunning and it was so interesting to see such a diverse style between the monuments like the pagoda and Greek temple.I loved watching the surfers at the far end of the garden. It was the perfect destination to relax by the river or have a picnic. I would recommend spending a whole morning or afternoon here when in Munich, especially after two days of rowdiness at Octoberfest.

title: Largest garden
text: It's really one of the largest and beautiful garden in the world which has been established more than 200 years ago as I know. I recomend it to everyone who visits Munich to see it. It has an amazing atmosphere.

title: Great way to indulge in nature in the heart of the city
text: Gorgeous, expansive landscape. Perfectly manicured lawns and great trails through the woods. Highly recommend to come and walk around. A fun hidden gem is the Eibachwelle, where you can find locals surfing on short boards in the river.

title: Beautiful
text: A beautiful piece of tranquility in the hustle and bustle of Munich. Much needed after a day at the â€˜fest!

title: wandeling

title: Central park de Munich
text: Vaste et somptueux havre de paix Ã  Munich. Juste en face du quartier universitaire. Tout est bien entretenu, propre et respectÃ©. On sâ€™y sent en sÃ©curitÃ©. Canards, surfeurs, vendeurs de glace, beergarten,... Tout y est pour se ressourcer !

title: Huge park close to city center
text: If you want to get away from the city center and have a break this park is a good choice. It is huge. Ideal for a walk, a run or a picnic. Several entries to the park. Itâ€™s also possible to get a bite to eat or a drink.

title: A beautiful Sunday afternoon
text: We spent a beautiful Sunday afternoon strolling around the English Garden. We spent the previous day in Oktoberfest, and required a more leisurely and nature-inspired day to end our short trip to Munich. The Garden is one of the prettiest city gardens I've ever experienced. The area is very large, we spent hours walking around, ultimately walking around for about 9 miles/14.5km. There is much to see and do once you're there. We saw many musicians, watched the pretty ducks, stopped at a few beer gardens, and enjoyed the sun. It is also possible to rent a bicycle and enjoy the trails.

title: Beautiful scenic walk
text: We enjoy walking the city and its parks and this was a great place to visit on our down day.  If time and weather permits, I'd recommend going there and checking out the numerous spots and food within it.

title: A delightful place to spend a few hours
text: Stroll around here for at least 2 hours, but better some more. Must see the surfers. Chinese Tower worth a visit for lunch, beer garden style but in a very pleasant way. The scenery itself is worth the visit alone.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Beautiful and lots of space
text: I met a friend at the Beer Garden at this location and it was beautiful.  Lots of space,  lots of seating, good food and the grounds are beautiful.  I would go back again to enjoy the scenery.

title: Kutschenfahrt
text: Eine Kutschenfahrt durch den Englischen Garten wollten wir immer schon mal machen, heute haben wir dann zu Omas 80. eine Stadtrundfahrt durch die Stadt gemacht und anschlieÃŸend noch Englischer Garten. War toll und der nette Kutscher hat uns alles Ã¼ber die Stadt und die Pferde erklÃ¤rt. Ein wunderbares Erlebnis, machen wir bald mal wieder.

title: Great place for a walk on a sunny summer day
text: Massive open space in the middle of the city that's well worth a visit.Call the Chinese Tower for a beer and some food and watch the world go by!

title: My first place to visit in Munich
text: I travel to Munich every summer and stay at an inn outside the city.... I always head right to the Chinese Tower in the English Garden where hundreds (thousands on weekends) gather to get scrumptious offerings at the line up of 'kiosks'  and of course that includes a hefty stein of Hofbrauhaus beer!  One of the special qualities of the place is joining with others at the long tables and occasionally end up in welcoming conversations.

title: Un paseo para descansar
text: Un lugar muy agradable y tranquilo para pasar unas horas en buena compaÃ±Ã­a. A poco que se pueda lo mejor es alquilar bicicleta para recorerlo entero. Muy aconsejable.

title: Mooi park en rustpunt in een drukke stad.
text: Er zijn ook vele rustige plekken in dit park naast de plaatsen met veel mensen zoals de Eisbach wave en de Biergarten. Tijdens warme dagen een aanrader.

title: Long walk to it but worth it
text: I really enjoyed the scenic walk to the english garden but leaving it tipsy was a hard one haha, Very very cool place to visit, clean and enjoyable atmosphere. Good beer and great views, good music too! Everyone was friendly and everything was well organized. Loved it!

title: Outdoor oasis
text: This must be Munich's Central Park. It just doesn't have the noise. Plenty of open space and a chance for some piece and quiet. The urban surfers on the man made Rapids was a hoot. And the Goldener Bar at the Haus der Kunst is a real treat.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Stop on the hop on hop off
text: Beautiful like you are walking inside a painting. Beautiful vibe and if the weather is nice, could picnic all day

title: Beer Garden
text: English Garden is also known as Beer Garden. Best place to walk around and try different flavours of beers. You just have to walk a little bit  long in the garden to reach from one place to another. As Garden is vast and have Lake in between. Every weekend the musical artists perform in beer garden where you can order some nice beers and amazing foods and listen to lovely music.

title: English Gardens
text: Walked through the gardens but didn't cover it all, they're so big we probably only saw 10% of it. Nice area in the centre with a beer hall and food stalls however it was a rainy day when we were there so was a bit quiet.

title: Take a bike!
text: A great place for a bike ride and a stop at the beer garden. Loved watching surfers show off in the river.

title: Encantador e apaixonante!

text: the grounds are so beautiful and the biergarten was great fun. nice place for a bike or scooter ride!

text: Found it to be too big but was happy to be there.  Isar was pretty.  Liked to see people surfing.  The place was a respite from the warm temperature outside.

text: Huge park and will take you a while to get around. Not really much to see, apart from the River Surfing and Chinese Tower. However its great on a sunny day and very relaxing

title: beautiful
text: Huge and and well organized area, nice places for seat and have a drink or some food. Good for walking, too.

title: Big park
text: As parks go I really liked this one. We were here during the oktoberfest and the city is really at its best. Lots of pretty walking paths, a great bierhalle by the chinease tower. Taste the local food and see the moronic surfers at the south of the park

title: Lovely place to visit in the city
text: Great place to walk on around the river and park. Really clean and easy to get to and around The food itâ€™s really good as is the beer. Nothing better on a sunny day.

title: Besuch in MÃ¼nchen
text: Wie immer hat es mir gut gefallen und es mir wieder aufgefallen wie wichtig es ist aus Bremen wegzuziehen

title: Englischer Garten
text: A great place to visit if you are in Munich and the weather is good. The restaurant has very nice traditional food and Service is great!

title: Wonderful place at Munich
text: Wonderful place at Munich, organized and clean! you can run, ride with bike or spend time to kiss and having fun with friends... you can surf! Yes, I said surf!

title: Central Park van MÃ¼nchen
text: Net als het Vondelpark in Amsterdam en Central Park in New York kun je hier genieten van de rust en allerlei bijzondere mensen. Heerlijk!

title: A beautiful place to relax and unwind
text: We wandered through this peaceful place to recharge after a busy few days sight seeing. Be mindful, there are nudist areas in the park so donâ€™t get a shock!

title: A Must Do
text: We started with breakfast, had a lovely walk through the garden. It was a Saturday and as the day progressed, the people flocked in.   We were fortunate with good weather.  Thousands of people throughout the garden, picnics, along the little river, playing games, sunbathing, or otherwise just hanging out.   Watched for quite some time the many people floating down the river and the surfers.   This was very entertaining.   The beer garden was a very nice experience.   Highly Recommend.

title: Biking through the Gardens
text: One of the highlights of our trip to Munich was biking through the English Gardens and stopping at the museums that lined it.

title: Il grande polmone di monaco
text: Bellissimo in ogni stagione, punto di ritrovo per giovani e anziani. Da vedere assolutamente i surfisti del fiume.

title: Good Food, Good Beer!
text: Good Food and Good Beer at reasonable prices in an outdoor beer garden. The perfect afternoon finale after walking around the old town/farmers market/palace.  A relatively short walk to the English Garden beer garden.

title: An enjoyable afternoon
text: We took a walk in the garden one afternoon after the city tour. We saw the famous surfers on the river. It's very big so plan on spending some time here. You can picnic or go to the restaurant. Know that it's a green space for the city. Lots of beautiful trees but few flowers.

title: So viel schÃ¶nes GrÃ¼n
text: Super entspannt zum ausruhen, an einem schÃ¶nen Sommerabend. Viel Platz und der Hund fÃ¼hlt sich hier auch wohl. So muss das sein :)

title: Green heart of Munich
text: Go there in summer and watch how Bavarians and tourists use this for all kinds of fun and relaxation.

title: Beautiful park in the middle of a large city
text: Took the underground to get to the Englischer Garden. A huge park in the middle of this busy city. Walked by the small lake at the north end of the park and made our way to the centre of the park to go to the beer garden for lunch. Wonderful day and able to enjoy sitting outside.

title: Beautiful stroll in an urban garden
text: A beautiful garden in the middle of the city.  Beautiful rivers and ponds. Easy walking pathways. The green lung of Munich

title: The English Garden is lovely
text: Had a great time just walking through the part anyway but the English Garden was lovely - just note they do have naked sunbathing in this area.  Go and find the surfers - yes really surfers - enjoyable to watch, envious of their skills!

title: Sencillamente maravilloso
text: Visitamos el jardÃ­n inglÃ©s un domingo, cuando todo estaba cerrado (incluso muchas cafeterÃ­as, panaderÃ­as y bares). Comimos en la cervecerÃ­a que estÃ¡ junto a la pagoda japonesa en un entorno muy agradable. Un parque perfecto para pasear en bici, tumbarse y relajarse y disfrutar. Aunque hay bastante gente no resulta agobiante porque el parque es enorme. Â¡Y es precioso!

title: A narrow but very long park. And very interesting experience of visiting it.
text: Literally a huge sausage along the Isar River. A couple of creeks also pass through the park, which pass through a pond at the Chinese Tower and end at a small waterfall, which is used by local surfers.My wife and I went around only 1/5 of the park, but even so we got an interesting impression. First, we met several groups of people swimming in a creek. Then we were very surprised to see an enormous number of people resting in open green areas with picnics. People with picnics also come out at our local park on weekends, but I have never seen so many people like here. Then we went to the Chinese Tower, which had food service stalls, fenced with a pass system and many tables at which people ate. Near the tower was a restaurant with beautiful architecture. Then, when we went further, we once again saw an open area with a large number of vacationers, and another bathing place. This time there were stones with a small waterfall from which they coped on rubber rings. At the end of the park, on a small island, there was a Japanese tea house, which we didn't get in because of the long waiting line. And on the other side there was a place fiercely chosen by surfers and their fans, since there they could ride on a stream of water emerging in the creek. Very interesting park and experience visiting it. I think on another day it would be deserted, so if you visit it, I highly recommend doing it on a day off or some holiday.

title: Immer wieder schÃ¶n - echt MÃ¼nchner LebensgefÃ¼hl
text: Entspannt spazieren gehen, die Sonne genieÃŸen, den Surfern auf dem Eisbach zuschauen - ein perfekter SpÃ¤tsommertag! Bemerkenswert: Saubere und schÃ¶ne Toiletten am Chinesischen Turm!

title: Lovely big green park
text: Green, spacious park. Singles, families, dogs, many on bicycles or just wandering or relaxing even sunbathing. We were made aware of some nude bathing (didnâ€™t see any) so be aware. Worth a visit.

title: GrÃ¼ne Oase MÃ¼nchens
text: Der englische Garten ist die grÃ¼ne Oase MÃ¼nchens. Im Sommer ist hier immer etwas zu sehen. Immer wieder schÃ¶n um durch zu schnaufen.

title: Da non perdere
text: Tipico giardino im centro cittÃ  con vari punti in cui fermarsi e rilassarsi. Consiglio di noleggiare bici per girarlo perchÃ© Ã¨ molto grande. Consiglio anche di guardare chi fa surf.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Perfect city park
text: This place is brilliant. We are from Sydney and we found the English Garden to be exceptional! We had a lovely lunch at the Chinese Pagoda and listened to the Bavarian band. We walked throughout the gardens and watched the river surfers. So fun! A lovely day out.

title: Nice park in middle of the city
text: Best part was the standing wave in the creek that goes through the middle of the park.  Where several streams come together, there is a permanent large standing wave where surfers (in wet suits of course) wade out and actually surf.  Great photo-op.

title: Beautiful place
text: A beautiful and relaxing place.  If I lived in Munich I would be there every day.  Its fun to watch surfers in a German city!

title: Beautiful Park
text: It was a lovely day to go to the English Garden. Walking is very easy with paved pathways and food and beer along the way.

title: Amazing park
text: Went there on a warm sunny Sunday and it was packed, but still didnâ€™t feel crowded. Gigantic, beautiful and filled with many places to sit and watch the passing parade of people. The surfers were fun to watch. Not like SoCal or Hawaii, but they are making the best of a land locked city. The river running through the park is pretty and pretty rapid, but people are in it swimming and having fun when weather is good. If you want some exercise or forest bathing, visit the English garden.

title: If you have time necessary to walk.
text: We have been there on february it was little bit cold but sunny. We walked with kids in the Garden It is really big and I am sure will be more better in Autumn or Sipring.

title: Ein Ort der Erholung und des Genusses
text: Ob Flanieren oder Entspannung im Park, ob Surfer am Eiskanal oder einfach nur ein gutes MaÃŸ Bier und ein HÃ¤ndl am "Chinesischen Turm". Der Englische Garten ist immer ein Muss fÃ¼r mich.

title: Delicioso piquenique no rio
text: Parque enorme, com inÃºmeros gramados excelente para um piquenique em um dia de sol. Biergarten com mÃºsica bÃ¡vara ao vivo, parque infantil e torre Chinesa. Muitos lugares para sentar! Rio tem a Ã¡gua fria mesmo com sol mas Ã© muito bom para refrescar no auge do verÃ£o. Monopteros Ã© um local lindo para fotos. Leve um mapa e garrafinha de Ã¡gua , pois parque Ã© enorme!

title: Bello
text: Il giardino inglese di Monaco Ã¨ enorme, ben tenuto in quasi tutte le sue parti e frequentato da ogni genere di persona, si possono anche liberare i cani per farli giocare, al suo interno vi sono anche chioschi dove comprare bibite o gelato e un ristorante. Nel complesso vale la pena farci una passeggiata in un pomeriggio di sole.

title: Meraviglia increibile
text: Questo parco merita anche da solo la visita di Monaco. Enorme, bellissimo, pulito. Una location fantastica in cui sentirsi immersi nella natura. Ãˆ possibile rilassarsi sullâ€™erba, vicino al lago, ai torrenti. Gustarsi del cibo, girare in bici. Un posto da sogno.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Englischer Garten MÃ¼nchen - Muss man gesehen haben !
text: Meine MÃ¤dels und ich gehen regelmÃ¤ÃŸig im Englischen Garten in MÃ¼nchen spazieren, ein Muss fÃ¼r jeden MÃ¼nchen Besucher ! Egal ob im Sommer (genial) oder auch zur Winterszeit, hier kann man in Ruhe flanieren und seine Zeit verbringen.

title: English Garden
text: Great place for a morning/afternoon stroll away from the traffic. Allow 2-3 hours and a good 2-3 miles walk.Take 15 minutes to watch the surfers on the Eisbach river. There is a concrete step under the surface that produces a 1 metre wave. Also the chinese tower where you can rest and have a beer/ snack. Nearby is a Monopteros, a Greek style temple with great views of the city.

title: Bellissimo, ma tutto in tedesco!!! :))
text: Bellissimo il parco e tutte ciÃ³ che Ã¨ allâ€™interno, merita assolutamente la visita, unica pecca, ci fosse una indicazione in un altra lingua che non sia il tedesco!! :))

title: IMPERDIBILE!
text: Se siete stati a Monaco di Baviera ma non avete nai visitato la pagoda del giardino inglese,non sapete quello che vi siete persi.Una birra buonissima e le costine di maiale che,se le assaggia Rubio,chiede la cittadinanza onoraria!Una sosta obbligata quando si arriva in questa meravigliosa cittÃ . Andateci!

title: PulmÃ£o de Munique
text: Maior que o Central e o Hyde Park. Lindo! Muito divertido ver os alemÃ£es surfando e o Biergarten Ã© Ã³timo! Super astral

title: English garden outdoor vender booth
text: We liked the outdoor vendor that provided beer, sausages and crepes for us to sit and enjoy the lake view.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Erstmals besucht
text: Schon lange wollten wir den englichen Garten besichtigen. Diesmal hat es nun endlich geklappt. Eine wunderbare und gepflegte Anlage! Sehr sehenswert.

title: Decimpress
text: Beautiful relief from heat or hustle from city. Beware cyclists getting in. Great open cafe at edge of park
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Nice gardenâ€™s
text: We walked around the English gardenâ€™s it has a nice lake that you can rent a boat to enjoy the lake, the are places to get food, you can ride your bike around the English gardenâ€™s  There are buses that go into the garden s too
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Magnificent
text: It felt like one could walk forever in the park. A river runs through it as do numerous canals and beer gardens. We lunches lakeside after a long and lovely walk. It was a memorable day.

title: Evasione dal caos
text: Bellissimo parco molto grande. Diciamo che Monaco centro Ã¨ troppa o caotica per i miei gusti perciÃ² ho apprezzato tantissimo questo parco. Consiglio a tutti ğŸ˜‰ğŸ˜Š
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: A Grand Walk
text: The English Garden wasnâ€™t typically English in my mind as I would associate that with flowers. More like open parkland but enjoyable nevertheless. Obviously very popular with walkers, cyclists, picnickers, runners, families, relaxation classes, yoga etc and even surfers (you have to see it for yourself!). Dog walkers are even provided with free doggy bags. Being in Germany there was the expected nude sunbather too, elderly male (arenâ€™t they all?). If you have time and crave some peace, traffic free, then its a relatively short walk from Marienplatz.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Huge beautiful park
text: Beautiful park. Great waterfalls, fast moving rivers, surfboarders, pretty gardens. You can travel around the park on foot, bike, electric scooter or horse and carriage

title: Wonderful park with walking/running trails and surfers!
text: A bus leaves Munich central train station and drops you off in the middle of this park where you can stroll or run.  It is a very large park.  Don't miss the surfers, yes surfers, on the Eisbach, a small channel of the Isar River at the south end of the park.  They surf the continuous, ice-cold wave that rolls through the channel all day long.

title: visit for the fame
text: A nice Park but nothing more . I supose its a great escape for Muncheneese durring summer weekends to take a walk and cool down . Starbucks coffe nearby serving as usual good cofee .

title: A nice surprise
text: Over for a weekend and very surprised by this beautiful park that is in a classical English designe,  A lovely place to spend an afternoon.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Beautiful
text: The park is huge and beautiful. If the weather is nice, you can have a picnic there and just enjoy the views (just be advised public nudity in the park is apparently legal and somewhat common).Overall beautiful place.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Do not miss
text: A beautiful park.  Make a point of watching the surfers.  Also make a point to rent bikes.  Great way to see the park.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Excellent Park
text: It is execellent park to walk and to take a break from shopping. It will be very good if you will take a pike and drive around to see the whole park, there is a taxi but it is a little bit expensive,

title: Beautiful garden
text: The atmosphere was fabulous and we enjoyed it so muchVery nice garden with large areas for walking and also a racetrack for bicycle lovers

title: Sight seeing
text: The English gardens are just beautiful , and was a lovely day , the beer garden is great and we had strudel really nice .Went and watched the surfing in the river in the English garden.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Bring your walking shoes
text: The best way to see the park would probably be on a bike tour. The garden is so big it is hard to take in everything. We didn't realize you could not rent bikes within the park and spent a lot of time getting lost looking for them! The view from the greek temple gave a great view of the important buildings in Munich (and a few cranes). Seeing the surfers at the south edge of the park is a must do! Their skill in such a small space is very impressive!

title: WunderschÃ¶n
text: Ich liebe einfach solche Orte, wo man ohne Ende laufen kann und die Natur bewundern kann. Mir hat es gut gefallen obwohl es sehr regnerisch war. Aber na ja, das Wetter ist so, wie es ist :)

title: Huge beautiful
text: The gardens are amazingly beautiful. It is a huge park, with plenty of bike and walking paths. When the sun shines, the park get lots of people walking, biking or just laying under the sun. Really worth visiting.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Belleza natural
text: Este parque de acceso pÃºblico es un oasis en la ciudad; en el cual turistas y locales disfrutan del aire libre. Cuenta con un Biergarten, donde podes sentarte a comer platos tÃ­picos alemanes, dulces o salados o, simplemente, consumir una cerveza rodeado de calma y naturaleza.

title: Mi lugar favorito en MÃºnich
text: Es un parque enorme y precioso.Hay que dejar un dÃ­a, al menos, para disfrutarlo. Alquila una bici o pasea...come algo y bebe una buena cerveza en la pagoda. Si tienes tiempo pasea, ve el lago, cruza los puentes y tÃºmbate en el cÃ©sped para retomar fuerzas.

title: Immer einen Besuch wert
text: Mit der schÃ¶nste Park in MÃ¼nchen. Der Biergarten am Chinesischen Turm zwar sehr touristisch und die Preise sehr gesalzen aber alles gut und man sitzt einfach sehr schÃ¶n dort. Der Park an sich sehr weitlÃ¤ufig und schÃ¶n.Das Einzige was total nervt wie aber in ganz MÃ¼nchen die Ã¼berall wild abgestellten E-Roller und Miet-RÃ¤der.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Immer ein Besuch wert!
text: Ein MUSS wenn man in MÃ¼nchen lebt! Es gibt unzÃ¤hlige tolle Ecke, tolle BiergÃ¤rten und Restaurant. Ein Ort fÃ¼r die ganze Familie!

title: The bier garten by the Chinese Tower is a must do
text: Enjoy the bier garten by the Chinese Tower. The band played in the tower, the food and beer flowed, and the people watching was outstanding. We took a taxi there and back, but we saw several city buses.

title: Big park
text: Nice park with forests and loads of open space, there is a large nudist section if that is what you are into!

title: Zeer mooi
text: Zeer grote stadspark met een kleine meer. Mooie padjes met banken. Daar is ook japanse huis en Eisbach voor surfing. Vanuit Monopteros kan je een zeer mooi uitzicht beleven. Een aanrader voor iedereen dus.

title: En god oplevelse
text: Parken er smuk og stor. Vi gik ind fra Schwabing og havde nogle gode timer i dejligt solskin vÃ¦k fra storbyens larm.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Sweet and well kept
text: This is a beautiful and well kept garden in the centre of Munich. Definitely check our the surfers as they are such an unusual sight. The water is very fast flowing here due to the surfing.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Beautiful area
text: We enjoyed walking through this area. It is beautifully maintained and has lots of different paths and activities. We watched people surfing in the current of the lake! Definitely worth the detour.

title: Wander to your hearts content
text: We went with family-adults- brought a blanket and picnic fare; supplemented beverages from vendorsâ€” great people watching- serene outdoor environment. Accessible to the Chinese Tower and surfers by walking. Many grassy spots along the river.

title: Big garden with some surprises
text: Look out for the surfers as you enter the gardens from the old town at Haus der Kunst. There are two or three spots to see them. Great to watch these adrenaline junkies do their thing. Would never have expected it and it was busy with them all!Chinese tower and Bier garden were great. Easily enough room to hold thousands of people!Didnt see it all as it is massive but what we saw of it was brilliant.

title: Time out and green in the city
text: Walking to the English garden and visiting the different areas is one way you can always spend your weekends or evenings after work if you live in Munich  or even a whole day if you are visiting the city. The Garden with it various sections offers ample opportunities to go for walks, picnic, play ball games, go running, ride your bikes or enjoy a beer with friends and strangers at one of the bear gardensI like the Chinese tower beer garden because they have the traditional Bavarian music there from a live band. If you are with smaller kids its also close to a beautiful playground. From the Monopteros you get a good view of the park. You also have the Japanese tea house and the Seehaus Restaurant & Beer GardenIts a great way to spend a day and evening with alone or with friends in Munich

title: Ruhige gemÃ¼tliche AthmosphÃ¤re am Turm
text: Biergarten Essen und Trinken bei Sonnenschein- was will man mehr...VernÃ¼nftige Preise und gutes Essen. PS: Wochentags ist es natÃ¼rlich viel ruhiger.

title: Paseo espectacular
text: Pasamos la tarde paseando, respirando aire fresco, viendo a la gente tomando el sol, nadando y haciendo surf. Es una gozada poder disfrutar de tanta naturaleza. Volveremos. Loli. Una murciana.

title: Perfecto para perderse
text: El jardin ingles es un lugar perfecto para deambular por el si ya has visto Munich o tienes tiempo libre, es muy grande y ofrece un entorno precioso, de los mejores parques que he visitado

title: Pretty and Peaceful
text: Beautiful park to walk, enjoy lunch at the Chinese beer garden while listening to the band. My suggestion is to take one of the pedal drivers to take you around the entire park as it is difficult to navigate. Whatever you do, do not leave the park without seeing the surfers.. Truly amazing!
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: A lovely place with a surprise !!
text: The park itself is beautiful and had wonderful facilities for those wishing to surf ! However be aware that itâ€™s also a place that welcomes and legally allows nudists to walk around. Itâ€™s a shock at first but one gets used to this very unenglish phenomenon. Photographs are forbidden .

title: A real treat in the middle of a city
text: So called because it is set out like an English garden.  A haven of peace in the middle of the city.  A must!

title: So beautiful - and huge! Great place for a walk and a relaxed afternoon
text: A must-do in Munich - take a walk in the summer and you'll see so many people stretched out on the grass, picnicking, sunbathing, cycling, even swimming in the fast-flowing river! Such a lovely way to spend an afternoon away from the city. Go to the Chinese Tower Beer Garden, too, for a beer and some excellent "kasespatzle".

title: Nice place
text: We spend the afternoon there with our 2.5 years old girlNice garden with lots of restaurants and local large beer Perfect place to hangout with friends and kids

title: English garden
text: Great place to visit for all the family,you can swim ride a bike have food and drink or just relax in the sun

title: Excellent place to walk and chill
text: We walked through the southern gardens several times on the way from our hotel to the old town and it was great to see the locals cycling and generally relaxing. Then  there are the river surfers near the entrance

title: Fuga dal cemento
text: Consiglio di passarci una giornata intera, magari usando una bicicletta, dato che a piedi in un giorno Ã¨ impossibile visitarlo tutto. Dimenticherete di essere in una cittÃ  e vi sembrerÃ  di avere fatto una gita in campagna. Ottima la possibilitÃ  di mangiare e bere presso la pagoda cinese.

title: Absolutes Highlight in MÃ¼nchen!!
text: So ein wunderschÃ¶ner Park. Im Sommer kann man dort super baden gehen oder einfach entspannen. Mein absolutes Highlight: den Surfern an der Eisbachwelle zu sehen. Ansonsten hat der Park einiges schÃ¶nes zu bieten und auch einige CafÃ©s und Restaurant am Parkrand/um dem Park herum

title: Passeggiando in bicicletta
text: Affittate una bici e godetevi il benessere che una bella passeggiata in riva al fiume, tra i verdi prati magnificamente curati e adeguate zone di ristoro, possa darvi. Una tipica orchestrina allietera' le vostre lunghe pedalate e se per caso foste accaldati... niente paura, lasciatevi trasportare dalla piacevole  corrente del fiume lento. Una giornata di pieno relax praticamente a portata di mano! Che la serenitÃ  sia con voi ğŸ˜Š

title: Precioso!
text: Un buen pulmÃ³n en el centro de MÃºnich, se disfruta paseando, viendo a los surferos en la ola artificial del canal, muy divertida la banda alemana que toca en la pagoda y muy rica la cerveza que te tomas en la terraza de debajo de la misma.

title: Englisch Garten
text: All'interno dei Giardini si gode aria pulita e si puÃ² gustare un'ottima birra e buon cibo. Consigliato per vivere un pomeriggio in relax dopo avere visitato la cittÃ  di Monaco.

text: Wir waren mit dem Fahrrad im Englischen Garten wunderschÃ¶ne Anlage mitten in der Stadt, sehr schÃ¶ne BiergÃ¤rten

text: GemÃ¼tlicher Ausklang eines Tages im Biergarten am Chinesischen Turm mit Freunden. Ein Hilight ist auch immer wieder die Eisbachwelle.

title: great variety of entertainment in a park
text: Just have a stroll through the park and discover the different corners of it. Watch the surfers in the river , even in winter they surf!, the many different locations of beer gardens,either under the trees or at the lake, or with live music. Take your shoes off and feel the ice cold water of the very strong current river. Just lie down, relax and just take it all in. I love the atmosphere !!

title: Der Central Park der MÃ¼nchener

title: Englischer Garten
text: Immer einen Besuch Wert, gerade mit Hund. Extrem groÃŸer Park, sehr weitlÃ¤ufig, mit guten Restaurants und Biergarten

title: Lovely place.
text: A must visit for those who likes nature, a well maintained English designed garden. You can enjoy walking , and the scenery.

title: Always a good place to be
text: Great place to calm down from city strolling.Pass the surfers wave at the south tip of the park and walk all the way north to Biergarten "Chinesischer Turm". Relax, play and wonder how all the dogs come along with each other.

title: Der Garten der MÃ¼nchener
text: Eine grÃ¼ne Oase in mitten der schnelllebigen Innenstadt. Von ruhig bis actionreich ist alles geboten, ob Sonnenanbeter oder Schattensuchende, es ist fÃ¼r alle etwas.

title: Must visit once in Munich
text: Itâ€™s a great place to spend half day at , get your food , football, swimming suit and anything you want . Just be free, some people go free of clothes too there so take care not to get offended or offend anyone specially when you have kids or there is cultural issues regarding this action .You can enjoy walking or biking or using scooter . Didnâ€™t have time to try the Beer there , yet itâ€™s highly recommended by many people .

title: Walk through the park
text: A lovely park to stroll through. Lots of places to sit and soak up the views. There are lots of places to find food and refreshments. Great spaces for families and dogs.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Relaxing Day
text: Wonderful place in the middle of the city to relax, walk or bike around, or enjoy a beer at one of the beer gardens.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Visita obligada
text: Enorme en extensiÃ³n. Sorprende las distintas zonas, todas muy bellas. Buen lugar para pasar la tarde cuando el tiempo acompaÃ±a.

title: GIARDINI BELLISSIMI.
text: Un grande parco, bellissimo, molto curato. C'era anche un musicista che suonava il violoncello sotto una piccola cappella nel parco. Indimenticabile.

title: Natura incontaminata
text: Tapp obbligatoria se si Ã¨ a Monaco, molto utile per rigenerarsi. Passeggiare qua Ã¨ un sollievo, si Ã¨ completamente immersi nel verde e a contatto con la natura.

title: Amazing
text: This was part of our biking tour. We got to check out the Biergarten at the Chinese Tower and partake in some good German food and beer.

title: Zentrum der Altstadt

title: Really peaceful place

title: Great Place for kids and adults to relax
text: We visited the English Garden in Munich.It is a great place to walk and relax amidst greenery.We got some good beer and food near the Chinese Pagoda, and sat down for a good time.There was a good play area for kids nearby and they enjoyed playing there.On the return we walked around in the greenery, and relaxed.

text: Interesante Ã¡rea de surf, surf en un rÃ­o dentro de un parque en la ciudad, suena casi irreal pero es una visita obligada.

title: Una scoperta
text: Se si va in estate e si avesse la possibilitÃ  di prendersi una giornata libera la visita con un asciugamano per fare il bagno non puÃ² mancare. Lo definirei il Central Park du Monaco

title: Terrific open space for all within Munich to share.
text: A well maintained and wide ranging open space, with great areas to walk, cycle, stop to drink and eat, including in particular, the Chinese Tower beer garden location.Beware though, alongside some parts of the river, some of the local residents have a propensity to expose themselves, quite literally, by way of an area for nudity! Not really worth looking at to be honest, but be prepared, as you will need to check-in as you move along.Close to the city centre and within easy walking distance, so somewhere well worth visiting.

title: Prachtig park
text: Tijdens 4 dagen MÃ¼nchen 2 keer bezocht. Eerst alleen in het voorste gedeelte geweest waar men vanaf de Marienplatz in het centrum binnen 10 minuten naar toe loopt. Het was 30 graden die dag en veel lokale bevolking zwom in de aftakkingen van de Isar. Heerlijk om relaxen in de zon en een boek te lezen. De Chinesischer Turm bleek later ook de moeite waard. Deze ligt iets verder door. Een kapel speelt er blaasmuziek en in de biergarten rond de toren kan men door middel van zelfbediening eten en drinken.

title: English Garden year round
text: The English Garden is a little bit of heaven right in the middle of a city of 1.5 million.  I think it is part of what makes Munich feel more like a village.  You see such a mix of residents, tourists, old and young enjoying the park.  There are enough hidden places to feel you have nature all to yourself, or crowded spots to simply sit down and do excellent people watching.  There are the big things that are not to be missed;  surfers on the outer edge of the park, the bridge with the backdrop of lovely small waterfalls, the Chinese turn.  If you can rent a bike to go through, this is the ideal.  Also, every season has something unique to enjoy.  If you are lucky enough to catch it after a snow, bundle up and dive in.  It is breathtaking.

title: A good beer garden place
text: A decent place to enjoy some food and beer. I did not find it very amusing but it is good to relax. It has a good cycling track.

title: Sehr schÃ¶ne Anlage
text: Der Englische Garten ist wunderbar zum entspannen, man vergisst, dass man mitten in einer GroÃŸstadt ist.

title: Look for the surfers
text: I have a confession to make: I only saw a small part of the English garden.  The part I did, see, however, was a lot of fun.  They call it the surfer area.  There is an artificial wave that was created near a bridge.  The surfers take methodical turns catching the waves.  It is fun to watch.

title: Fabuloso parque
text: PulmÃ³n verde de Munich, espectacular para pasar el dia o un rato paseando por el o disfrutando de sus diferentes localizaciones,  sea a pie o en bicicleta , cuenta con locales donde tomar algo o comer

Non venite qui per vedere aiuole fiorite, ma per sport, immergersi nella natura e bere una buona birra con vista pagoda cinese!

title: Un verdadero relax en medio de MÃºnich.
text: Ayer tuvimos un dÃ­a de paseo desde la maÃ±ana bien temprano y en la tarde nada mejor que poder descansar y relajarse en este parque. Tiene unas zonas verdes divinas, pudimos dejar suelto a nuestro perro y el tambiÃ©n disfrutar. Hay 2 Biergarten que tienen muchas opciones para comer y por supuesto cerveza.Totalmente recomendable.

title: Imperdible
text: El jardÃ­n es muy grande, se puede pasar un buen par de horas caminando tranquilamente. EstÃ¡ bien cuidado y tiene zonas muy preciosas. En la torre china hay servicios de comida y cerveza, la cual funciona bien y se agradece si se lleva horas recorriendo el parque.Totalmente recomendado, es un lugar muy tranquilo y bonito.

title: A must see in Munich
text: Iâ€™m surprised some of my friends visited Munich and did not visit this park . It is a huge park and the streams of water that the surfers use were very nice to see .

title: Very peaceful, larger than Central Park
text: The English Garden is an absolute must for those visiting Munich! Take a Wegbier and go walk the park. The waterfalls are a must see

title: Visita obligada
text: Visita obligada en Munich, en verano lo usan como playa, muy tranquilo y lindo para sentarse a tomar sol y aire

title: Go and enjoy, its beautiful...
text: It's not far out of the old town, its 5 square kilometres, just amazing. Lots to see, enjoy the walk and relax.

title: Lovely spot to relax
text: Went in August and had good weather the whole time so spent a reasonable amount of time in the park. Would absolutely recommend the Eisbach area in good weather, the surfers are out which is interesting to see and the atmosphere is good for relaxing. Also nice area to walk around fairly close to the centre of the city

title: lovely place to wander and people watch
text: fantastic way to finish off a full days sightseeing by walking through the many paths and watching people swimming in the river or sunbathing by the banks. Thoroughly enjoyable

title: A must in the Summer
text: Just a brief walk from the Marienplatz, its a must to see in the Summer. Free admission, and Name one other park that you can surf ? You Can here. Or do as the locals do, float down the stream and relax, Just make sure you grab the rope before the rapids. Had enough walking ? hire one of the numerous bike taxis. Hungry ? inexpensive fare at the Bier gartens. And of course beer, soda water, Its alot of walking to see it all, Plan a good portion of the day and relax.

title: English garden
text: 1 kilometer wide and 7 kilometers long. This is the largest city park in the world. Three beer gardens. Even if you donâ€™t drink alcohol, the food is worth the stop. The biggest is the one at the Chinese tower. Mostly locals not just a tourist stop.

title: Gorgeous vibrant place
text: A lovely garden with a stream, lake and beautiful dappled light from the treea. The Chinese Turm area has a great beer hall with delicious food (looks much nicer than the one by the lake). Definately worth an afternoon. Lots of locals sunbathing and relaxing. Nice vibe

text: Il piÃ¹ grande parco dâ€™Europa, curato, pieno di verde, dove i residenti fanno il bagno sul fiume o praticano il surf. Da girare con i monopattini elettrici Ã¨ un autentico divertimento. text: An einem Sonntag bei herrlichem Sonnenschein wimmelte es von Menschen, aber es kommt keine Hektik auf. Hier kann jeder den Tag genieÃŸen mit und ohne Geld.

title: Reccomended
text: We had a wander around the park for a few hours and didnâ€™t even get to the very end. We came across 3 beer gardens. text: Great spot for a picnic and also worth chugging a few beers at the beer garden late evening. The river surfing is a must see.

title: Beautiful garden

text: Auch wenn die Nackerten mittlerweile einfach nur noch Ãœbriggebliebene sind, ist der Englische Garten einfach wunderschÃ¶n und durch die GewÃ¤sser eine angenehme Abwechslung zur Schickeria...

title: Wonderful day in the English Garden in Munich
text: It is a great park to spend a lazy afternoon. But also for a good long walk and to enjoy a nice beer near the Chinese house.

title: Bel parco
text: Bel parco da visitare a piedi o in bici! Bello vedere i surfisti, giocare a pallone i semplicemente starsene sdraiati all'ombra.

title: MÃ¼nchener mÃ¼sste man sein!
text: Wenn man den Englischen Garten in MÃ¼nchen besucht, einen der grÃ¶ÃŸten innerstÃ¤dtischen Parks der Welt, dann kann man schon neidisch werden auf die Menschen, die diese tolle Parkanlage vor ihrer TÃ¼re haben! Bei einem Spaziergang, im Biergarten unterm chinesischen Turm oder am Kleinhesseloher See, auf der Liegewiese oder auf einer Bank unter groÃŸen BÃ¤umen kann man herrlich entschleunigen.An einem Sonntag bei herrlichem Sonnenschein wimmelte es von Menschen, aber es kommt keine Hektik auf. Hier kann jeder den Tag genieÃŸen mit und ohne Geld. Interessant war es, den Surfern auf der Eisbachwelle zuzuschauen.Unvergleichlich, wie man am Chinesischen Turm mit Blasmusik begrÃ¼ÃŸt wird (auch wenn man kein Blasmusik-Fan ist), aber das Bier schmeckt einfach noch einmal so gut!Schnell ist man wieder im Stadtgebiet. Meine Empfehlung: Mit der U-Bahn zur Station "Lehel" fahren und dann einfach Richtung Norden laufen.Uns hat es super gefallen dort!

title: Bellissimo
text: Bellisimo parco, enorme, con un sacco di attivitÃ  da fare, compreso il surf!Se andate a Monaco non dimenticate di passarci almeno mezza giornata

title: Il grande polmone verde di Monaco
text: Il parco Ã¨ grandissimo con delle particolaritÃ : c'Ã¨ una pagoda cinese, in alto della quale suona una banda e in basso la gente mangia e beve birra, in una parte del parco, nelle belle giornate di sole in estate, la gente si mette in costume e fa il bagno nei ruscelli, in uno dei quali, quello ondoso, c'Ã¨ chi fa surf.

title: What a place!
text: Absolutely loved this treasure. If you love dogs this is the place to be, we also managed to â€˜pub crawlâ€ our way around the beer houses and enjoyed a ride on a pedalo for half an hour. Beautiful place with so much to do. Perfect picnic spot and suitable for all ages.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Giardini meravigliosi
text: Giardini splendidi. Ben tenuti. Girateli in bici. Il fiume che li attraversa Ã¨ proprio suggestivo. Fateci un pic nic con i vostri figli.

title: Ein Muss fÃ¼r MÃ¼nchenbesuch
text: Auf jeden Fall dort die mÃ¼nchene Luft tanken und Lebensart kennenlernen. Der englischer Garten ist grÃ¶ÃŸer als Central park in Neu York. Deshalb reicht nur zu FuÃŸ gehen nicht um alles anzuschauen. Wir haben dann ein Fahrradtaxi 38â‚¬ 30 min gemietet und mit dabei eine kleine FÃ¼hrung mitgebucht. Man kann dort z.B. Fahrrad oder E-scooter mieten und selber fahren.

title: Green Space
text: Fabulous park, albeit very busy when weather is fine. Worth checking out the surfers in the Eisbach.

title: Meraviglia
text: Il parco offre nstira,prari,boschi,lago e il fiume balneabile.Se avete fortuna con il tempo vi divertirete.Poi bei posti ristoro

title: svalka och lummighet
text: Vacker park att promenera i med hÃ¶ga gamla trÃ¤d och floden Isar som flyter igenom den. Var dock uppmÃ¤rksam pÃ¥ att vissa av gÃ¥ngvÃ¤garna Ã¤ven Ã¤r till fÃ¶r cyklister som kan komma i hÃ¶g hastighet. HÃ¤r finns dessutom ett par Biergarten.

title: Un vero incanto
text: Un grande polmone di verde per Monaco! Sembra quasi di stare in campagna, ma poi ti ricordi che sei venuto in metro. Incredibilmente piacevole
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Wonderful park
text: Visited here on recent trip to Munich during very hot weather! Huge lovely park with fantastic river running through it in which if you are young enough you can jump in to and get carried way downstream by the current which hundreds of people were doing....just not me!! Beer Garden in middle of park fantastic. You have to go for the litre glass!!

title: Beautiful gadren
text: Great view. Good for family to spend time togerher.  Especially the sunrise is pretty and romantic !!!

title: Wonderful garden
text: The green lung in the middle of MunchenThe park is huge and very pleasant even though I have not understood why it was called â€˜English â€˜A river travels across its length and dogs jump into it happily There are several beer gartens or restaurant A wonderful place to spend away a sunny afternoon

title: Brilliant day out
text: We hired bikes at Mike's Bikes and hit the park on a day with 32 degree temps, and we had a ball. Stopped off at the beer gardens for beer and pretzels every now and again, watched the surfers and all the locals treating it like a beach. Do get out of park for lunch (beer gardens are limited with food). We left from the left side of the lake and found a fab area with lots of little restaurants and bars - we ate in Souxe Meze Greek restaurant and had fab lunch. Love it.

title: Un vrai bol d'air au cÅ“ur d'une grande ville !
text: En famille, nous avons passÃ© une journÃ©e a Munich ! Quelle joie de pouvoir se promener dans ces grands espaces de verdure, d'arbres. A quelques centaines de mÃ¨tres de la ville, nous observons des fleurs, des Ã©cureuils, des oiseaux. Reposant !

title: Fantastic Park
text: A huge open space which it seemed the locals were all enjoying to relax doing whatever they wanted, even nude sunbathing. The surfers in the eisbach are a must see, really cool. Would be good to use bikes or scooters here.

title: Bellissimo
text: Distese immense di giardini perfettamente curati dove poter passeggiare con i bimbi piccoli o grandi che siano. E poi di tanto in tanto questi â€œchioschiâ€ con giochi per i piÃ¹ piccoli e punti di ristoro organizzatissimi e con tanto cibo e tanta birra. Per passare una bellissima giornata di relax!!!

title: Surprenant
text: En arrivant dans ce poumon vert de Munich nous sommes initialement tombÃ© sur un spot de surfer...... incroyable aprÃ¨s nous vous conseillons d'aller dÃ©guster une biÃ¨re aux alentours de la tour chinoise une vÃ©ritable incursion dans la vie munichoise.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Gran parque urbano
text: Precioso parque donde puedes encontrar gente tomando el sol (incluso haciendo nudismo), surfistas en unas olas creadas en el rÃ­o, una Cervera con mesas en el parque y muy buen ambiente.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: GroÃŸe grÃ¼ne Lunge im Herzen von MUC
text: Alles vorhanden. Surfer im Eiskanal, grÃ¼ne Wiesen, alter Baumbestand, Monopterus, der Chinesische Turm, Biergarten, Blasmusik.

title: Relax
text: Einfach dem groÃŸen Dorf entfliehen und sich treiben lassen und schÃ¶ne Blicke genieÃŸen am Eisbach bei den Surfern beste Unterhaltung

title: Relax and enjoy the beauty
text: What a delightful and relaxing time at this lovely park!  If you go donâ€™t miss the surfers, yep they were surfing and going down the river ... fun. Games, sunbathing, walking, biking... the park has it all.  Oh there is a beer garden at the Chinese tower.  Enjoy!

title: Il polmone verde di Monaco
text: Il giardino Ã¨ molto grande, si gira molto bene a piedi o in bicicletta. Al suo interno, oltre agli sconfinati spazi verdi ed ai boschi, sono presenti la torre cinese, con un grande Biergarten, la zona per surfare sul fiume, il Monopteros (anche se purtroppo l'ho trovato molto sporco) e diversi laghetti artificiali. Consiglio vivamente una visita, soprattutto se si Ã¨ a Monaco durante il periodo estivo dell'anno.

title: Vergelijk met central park is meer dan terecht
text: Prachtig park met bossen, grasvelden, waterpartijen waar je kan varen. Mooie wandelpaden, biergarten en heel wat vertier.zwemmen en zonnen, fietsen ....alles kan . Ontspannend

title: Espectacular
text: Parque dentro de la ciudad donde llegas con el metro. Tiene muchas hectareas de cesped para poder tomar el sol, tumbarte, jugar.... llegas al lago donde hay patos y cisnes. Puedes coger un patinete o barca y recorrerlo. Hay zonas para poder tomarte una cerveza o otra bebida. Vale la pena visitarlo.

title: Una bella mattinata a ferragosto!
text: Parco immenso, che in alcuni punti sembra quasi un bosco. Ãˆ un posto meraviglioso, che vale la pena visitare
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Felice sorpresa
text: Abbiamo (io, moglie e 3 figli) visitato questo grande parco per vedere i surfisti! Il parco richiama davvero i grandi parchi londinesi (da cui il nome) e viene attraversato da alcuni corsi dâ€™acqua? Nella parte sud vicino allâ€™ingresso est si possono vedere i surfisti che a turno cavalcano un onda statica. Sono davvero molto bravi. Mai avrei creduto di riuscire a vedere gente surfare a Monaco.

title: Erholung pur mitten in der Stadt
text: Ein echtes Juwel fÃ¼r die ganze Stadt, ein groÃŸer Park mit vielen FreizeitmÃ¶glichkeiten, guten Restaurants und diversen Kiosken, die so alles bieten, was man fÃ¼rs leibliche Wohl braucht. Besonders trendig der Kleinhesseloher See, der Chinesische Turm und der Monopterus!

title: Passeggiata nel verde
text: Immenso parco, perfetto per essere girato in bici, immancabile le tappe in uno dei tipici chioschi sempre presenti con birra e cibo bavarese. Merita assolutamente anche il giro in barca nel laghetto (10 euro per 30 minuti, a scelta tra pedalÃ² e barca a remi).
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Magnifique endroit de verdure en plein centre
text: Vous cherchez un havre de paix aux ambiances diffÃ©rentes....Allez-y. Du simple coin de verdure, aux magnifiques vues sur les lacs...Footing, vÃ©lo, balade...vous avez le choix !A faire impÃ©rativement sur Munich !

title: WunderschÃ¶ner Park
text: Sehr schÃ¶ner Park mit See, mit vielen BiergÃ¤rten, toll zum spazieren, relaxen, einfach zum geniessen.

text: Mi ha meravigliato positivamente,immenso,d'estate Ã¨ possibile fare il bagno,bellissima la zona ristorante vicino alla pagoda cinese
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Un giga parc
text: Nous lâ€™avons fait sous quelques averses malheureusement mais il y a de quoi faire des kilomÃ¨tres ! Parc trÃ¨s bien entretenu, de belles oies et canards. Dommage quâ€™il nâ€™ait pas intÃ©grÃ© des mini fermes, chevaux.... Faire de la barque ou du pÃ©dalo est trÃ¨s chouette. Le bus 68 qui y va permet de visiter la ville.

title: Beautiful view! Perfect for hot day
text: Atmosphere there was great ! The day I visited English garden was on Sunday so I was able to see lot of people around. The narrow river inside the gardens I found quite amusing. It was fun watching people swimming and surfing in that small river. Park is green and lots of shade so itâ€™s nice to bring a picnic blanket, food and beverages and chill out for few hours. I was visiting it on my own but even people watching was quite amusing! And not to mention that beer garden at the beginning of the park is quite good.

title: The Surfers
text: The best of the English Garden was the surfers. I really enjoyed watching them surf in the canal. They were so good.

title: Great place to stroll
text: Nice park to relax, picnic, and walk around. Lots of different interesting buildings as well as a surfing wave in the river.

title: Absolutely beautiful!
text: We were lucky to have good weather while visiting here - super relaxing and fun vibe. In the summer you can swim in the river. Massive park that has lovely walking tracks. Highly recommended
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Paradise in the City
text: We took the U bahn and got off at the University stop and walked right into the park from there on a beautiful summer day.  We enjoyed floating in the chilly river, but this was one of the reasons we came to Munich so we did it!  Plenty to see with some men very comfortable walking around naked, boy did my teen age girls get a lesson, but again it is Europe! Just watch out for rocks on the bottom, keep your feet up!  We also meant bikes one day near that same entrance behind the beer garden.  They were bikes with a bit of an extra battery pack to go faster so we were able to see most of the park in a couple of hours, it is HUGE.  My daughters enjoyed watching the surfers the most!

title: very relaxing
text: very  relaxing garden with open beer garden restaurants, swimming and water surfing places, rowboat renting and more.Fine place in summer heat.

title: A Big Park, Not a Garden
text: The English Garden is a misleading name as it is really a very big park with a lake, streams, lots of geese and ducks, cafes, restaurants and an area of fast flowing water where you can watch surfers practising.  It was fairly disappointing as the name gives the impression of flower gardens, borders and something to admire and take an interest in.  It's really big so you can have a very long walk if you want and there are plenty of places to sunbathe and paddle in the streams, but it's definitely not a garden!

title: Che passeggiata!
text: Bellissimo polmone verde nel cuore di Monaco di Baviera... sicuramente da visitare per una pausa rilassante... consiglio di andare al centro del parco per pranzare dove c'Ã¨ una Torre cinese... sotto questa torre cinese vi sono tantissimi tavoli in legno dove Ã¨ possibile bere e mangiare a poco prezzo...!

title: Beautiful garden in the city of Munich
text: I enjoyed walking through the gardens during my trip to Munich. It was a cool autumn day with good sunlight. Very relaxing visit.

title: Large park with a large beer garden and plenty of space to relax
text: Don't miss the surfing on the river. Be aware that you can bump into  the odd nudist when the sun is out.

title: Un posto magico
text: Un parco immenso, pieno di verde che ti consente di intrattenerti in ogni modo possibile;facendo un pic nic, rilassandoti grazie alle vaste aree. Da provare lo street food che si tiene attorno alla torre giapponese ti consente di immergerti a pieno nella coltura bavarese. Lo consiglio come attivitÃ  da fare la domenica.

title: MAGIC PLACE
text: Unâ€™immensa macchia  di verde ,câ€™Ã¨ qualsiasi forma di svago, tante aree per rilassarsi ,stendersi e fare un semplice pic nic,da provare  sopratutto  lo street food attorno  alla torre giapponese  riesci a fonderti a pieno nellâ€™aria bavarese,consigliato come attivitÃ  di domenica

title: schÃ¶ner Spaziergang
text: Wir konnten den â€englischen Gartenâ€œ bei sehr schÃ¶nem Wetter kennen lernen. Es sind feine Spazierwege vorhanden und man kann die schÃ¶n angelegten Wege erkunden. Besuch gehÃ¶rt in MÃ¼nchen sicherlich zu einem Muss.

title: Meraviglioso
text: Stupendo, una vera oasi cittadina. Da non perdere, anche per un giro in bici o sosta pic nic. E lâ€™angolo dei surfisti Ã¨ quasi surreale. Atmosfera easy life!

title: AbkÃ¼hlung in der Sommerhitze mitten in MÃ¼nchen
text: Sehr lohnenswert ein Besuch des englischen Gartens in MÃ¼nchen. Auch mit Kinder und Jugendlichen. Umgeben von zahlreichen GaststÃ¤tten und Museen. Auch die sehr belebte Shoppingmeile â€LeopoldstraÃŸeâ€œ ist wenige Meter entfernt.

title: Un lugar para pasear
text: Es un parque con una especio de recorrido de rio, donde te puedes baÃ±ar y hay gente incluso haciendo Surf en una zona.Tienen Biergarden para tomar una cerveza o comer al aire libre

title: Lunghissima passeggiata
text: Un bellissimo parco nel cuore di Monaco, dove si respira area pulita e silenzio! Scarpe comode e dedicate tanto tempo a questo posto!
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: TrÃ¨s original
text: Parc trÃ¨s grand avec possibilitÃ© de se reposer, de se baigner, mais attention lâ€™eau est trÃ¨s froide.

title: A must walk!!!
text: Easy to access, this huge garden is right in the center of Munich and offers a buffer for every local and tourist to visit and enjoy. On week ends it gets packed by local families that enjoy with pic nic and even bathing in the many rivers that cross the park. There is also a surfers corner, a must see!!!!

title: What a super real German experience.
text: The Chinese Tower in the middle of the park is easy to find. Beneath is a German beer garden- one of the highlights of our trip. There is so much choice - sausages, pasta, noodles, meatloaf, chips etc. As well as huge glasses of beer: including non alcoholic, shandy and soft drinks. Not cheap but excellent fun. Choose your dishes and drinks then pay on exit. Even live music coming from the tower. What could be better?

title: Balade en famille
text: Une belle dÃ©couverte, un parc immense, et le plaisir d'y trouver des beergarten, c'est de l'authenticitÃ© et rien de plus. TrÃ¨s bel endroit

title: Very good experience
text: Our group of 8 american adults enjoyed the experience. Fortunately we had a German speaker, who knew we needed to self serve beer and food.  Prices were not any higher than other restaurants. Food  was good, beer great. Gelato absolutely delicious. â‚¬1.50\scoop. Extra bonus: Band was playing in pagoda! Not too crowded when we were there, 4-5pm. Many open tables.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Beautiful - donâ€™t miss the surfing!
text: Our visit in the park started with a stop at the surf spot, â€surfing the Eisenbachâ€. Really cool! We are not surfers but enjoyed watching so stayed for a bit. Then we started walking the south part and the rain was pouring down. Still beautiful and almost empty of people so we got some nice photos. A great place to just stroll around. Only thing missing is more public restrooms.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Ã‡ok gÃ¼zel
text: Her yer gÃ¶z alabildiÄŸine yemyeÅŸil. ÃœstÃ¼nÃ¼zden yaban kazlarÄ± ( Ã¶rdek de olabilir) uÃ§uyor. 3 km karelik bir alan. AslÄ±nda MÃ¼nih yeÅŸillikler ÅŸehri. BinalarÄ±n boyunu aÅŸan aÄŸaÃ§lar her tarafta. Hem tarihi dokuyu hem yeÅŸili korumuÅŸlar.

title: Cross the bridge to escape the crowds.
text: Very beautiful place to explore by bike. We rented from MucBike which is next to the entrance closest to the university. The main part is very crowded, but if you cross the bridge over the highway, the are becomes ideal for bicycling.

title: Runs, floating, relaxing
text: Great spot with so many different trails and spots for different activities.As mostly a runner there, the trails are fantastic and you can get great circuits throughout without getting bored or feeling trapped. Great balance of shade and sun for different weather patters.Great spot on a really hot day as there are heaps of spots by the streams to either dunk in or float, a popular pass time for locals either on small inflatables or just lying on their backs. As large as it is, you never feel crammed, even on weekend sunny days.Also so many spots for sports and other activities on the many lawns. Beer gardens are either within the park or right by it, making it easy to have a typical German experience.Not as many washrooms without having to walk further and not really any water fountains. Tough for longer runs in hot weather, though there are kiosks for buying water (not ideal though).If you're lucky you may see a true local on a warm summers day strolling naked after a good float on the stream.

title: Un bellissimo parco!
text: Anche lâ€™ho visitato in serata dopo cena devo ammettere che Ã¨ uno dei parchi pubblici piÃ¹ belli e piacevoli dove sono mai stato, ricco di scorci suggestivi Ã¨ molto curato e pulito, attraversato del fiume Isar Ã¨ facilissimo incontrare cigni, papere ed oche. Al suo interno ci sono anche due dei piÃ¹ grandi biergarten di Monaco dove potersi fermare a mangiare e bere.

title: Piacevole scoperta
text: Tra i piÃ¹ grandi parchi urbani del mondo, il Garten Ã¨ davvero bello da vedere e visitare! Curatissimo, pulito e con le papere e i cigni che, abituate allâ€™uomo, ti passano accanto senza paura! Ha due biergarten enormi allâ€™interno e il fiume che, in un punto, offre la possibilitÃ  di fare surf! Lo abbiamo visto in serata e anche alle 22 Ã¨ frequentato perchÃ© molto sicuro.

title: Bellissimo nonostante la pioggia
text: Nonostante la pioggia ci siamo visitati una grande parte di questo parco immenso, utilizzando i monopattini elettrici e mangiando in un ristorante tipico al centro del parco... Molto particolare vedere i ragazzi che facevano surf sui fiumi che lo attraversano
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Munich must see sight
text: The vibrancy of this place was simply mesmerizing. The garden is large and a meeting point for virtually the whole of Munich. If you draw energy from crowds then this will absolutely get you pumped, but equally, if you're more of the in-touch with nature but introverted, you can just as easily find plenty of quiet spots to hangout. Went for beer at the beer garden inside the English garden - was a little disappointed by the limited variety, but the vibe and the good company of friends more than made up for it.

title: GrÃ¼ne Oase in der Stadt
text: Ist unbedingt einen Besuch wert. Riesiges Areal am Rande der Innenstadt.Eisbachwelle ist kleiner als vermutet, trotzdem den Surfern zusehen. Das Jausenangebot am Chinesischen Turm ist umfangreich, aber auch sehr hochpreisig.

title: Un central park a Monaco
text: Enorme, verde e fresco sono sono alcune delle caratteristiche di questo parco... Nauta, laghi, fiumi, ristoranti e gelaterie si uniscono in una perfetta unione.Ottimo luogo per passeggiate e per godersi il verde.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Perfect escape from the heat
text: Itâ€™s the biggest park in Munich, where we can watch the famous canal where the brave surf on the waters. Thereâ€™s plenty of space for riding a bike, beer and relaxing. Itâ€™s a must see of Munich in the summer!

title: IdÃ©al par belle journÃ©e chaude!
text: Nous avons parcouru le parc Ã  pieds regrettant de ne pas avoir rÃ©servÃ© de vÃ©los, possible pas trÃ¨s loin du lac, il fallait le savoir,chose faite avec cet avis. Le Biergarten Ã  cÃ´tÃ© de la tour chinoise est parfait pour apprÃ©cier la biÃ¨re et la gastronomie locale. Ne pas.louper les dÃ©mos de surf, vaut le dÃ©tour !

title: Beautiful Large Gardens
text: These gardens have everything you need, swimmable rivers, abundant green space, beer gardens, itâ€™s simpler the best use of public space I have seen, well done Munich.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Surfing in the city
text: Yes, surfing in Munich.  The garden was beautiful to see, surfing made it interesting and our rickshaw driver made our adventure through the park amazing.

title: A breeze of fresh air in the middle of the city
text: A very pleasant park where we enjoy the pure air for a refreshing walk! What a great start to a productive day!

title: Chinese biergarten!
text: The Chinese biergarten iin the middle of the park should be high on your list of places to hit while visiting Munich. And definitely go check out the surfing at the far southern end of the park!
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Lindo parque urbano
text: A cidade em si jÃ¡ Ã© um parque, mas o English Garten Ã© surpreendente , estive no verÃ£o e o cidadÃ£o comum de Munique vai desfrutar do rio,ah eles fazem nudismo, e das prainhas de pedra ao redor. Lindas trilhas, com estrutura, um belo passeio

title: Beautiful!!!!!
text: I LOVE green spaces in the middle of urban cities!!!! Connecting with nature soothes the body and soul! The English Garden delivers beauty, tranquility and a most awesome biergarten!!! The grounds are well kept and there are so many different paths to explore!! The green River tributaries add such calmness and beauty to the landscape! The beer garden is exceptional.... big, clean, orderly and the food is yummy. The only things missing are MORE floral displays ( please!!!) and more signage. The park is HUGE! It would be nice to know where you are or where youâ€™re going. And adding more flowers would enhance the parks beauty!!!
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: A fabulous way to while away a sunny afternoon in Munich
text: Make sure you go watch the surfers!  Yes!  Surfers in Munich! and wander over to the China Tower biergarten for a beer and chat with locals

title: A relaxed day
text: If you visiting Munich you should go to English garden , itâ€™s a beautiful forest or huge natural park with a beautiful lake Young kids under 7 enjoyed a lot , different restaurants available and you can rent a bicycle and have a great day there Make sure you donâ€™t miss it

title: Gorgeous
text: I had a meeting at the university and I had an uber drop me off on the northern side of the gardens so that I could enjoy a leisurely walk down to the campus. Really gorgeous and peaceful in early July -- hard to believe it was in downtown Munich. The green did my soul good. Be sure to check out the surfers.

title: Beautiful!
text: A lovely stroll along the water and away from the hustle and bustle of the city.  Loved watching the surfers on the rapids, and the ducks on the calm waters.  Inadvertently wandered onto a nude â€œbeach,â€ but even that added to the fun.  Great day!

title: Hier hat jeder Platz zum entspannen
text: Hier ist es wirklich toll. Nur ein paar Meter von der Innenstadt findet jeder hier Erholung und Entspannung. Gesplegter riesengroÃŸe Parkanlagen fÃ¼r groÃŸ und klein. Wirklich beeindruckend und sollte jeder mal gesehen haben der es nicht kennt. Sogar FKK kann hier gemacht werden auf ausgewiesenen Bereichen. War ein Erlebnis und Erholung.

title: Nice walk but nothing unique
text: It was a nice day and a beautiful park, so if have time for a casual stroll on a nice day it would be worth some time, but if on limited time with so many sights to see I would not put it on top of my listOf must do things to do.

title: Huge garden to explore and chill out
text: This garden is bigger than Central Park or Hyde park! And has a surfing spot in it... yep; you read that right. Loads of waterways and grass to hang out on. Must visit when in Munich!

title: Lovely gardens and landscape
text: Very nice landscape gardens and park. Has a lovely river/stream running through the middle and wide spaces around. Need to be a bit aware of your surrounding on a warm sunny day as many nude bathers around.

title: Exceeded Expecations
text: We wanted to stop at the English Gardens on our first day in Munich to relax and get some grounding in after a long flight. It was a great decision. We stayed for about an hour but could have spent an entire day there just taking it all in and exploring. We got some yummy gelato to top off a perfect stop.

title: Fantastisch park
text: Heb hier met mijn vriendin aan het water gelegen. Het was die dag 35 graden en zo'n beetje de halve stad leek hier wel ergens bij of in het water te liggen. Het park is echter zo groot dat er altijd wel ergens een rustig plekje te vinden is. Het OV is zo goed geregeld dat je vanuit hier makkelijk door kunt naar andere delen van het centrum. Naast het feit dat dit een rustige plek is om op je gemak doorheen te lopen is het ook erg mooi ingericht. Zeker de moeite waard.

title: HUGE oasis
text: Great place to relax and reload before throwing yourself again into the City life. Donâ€™t forget to watch the surfers in the Eisbach!

title: English Gardens
text: A short walk from city to outdoors, literally. Great hiking experience with many fine details and beautiful spots to escape city chaos.

title: Beautiful Park
text: Beautiful Park, bigger than central park and running from central Munich Northwards. Well worth a visit, a lovely place with lots to do and see including a beer garden and very popular with locals which is amazing.

title: lovely nature
text: one of the best natural garden with lakes and river, birds, forests , sprawling green gardens , jogging track, lovely place to visit again and again to see the beauty of nature

title: Beautiful and large park
text: Relaxing walk through the park, was great as weather was good. Very large park and a few more signposts for areas would be good such as where the Japanese gardens are.

title: I never want to leave!
text: We knew we had to go here during our trip. Once we arrived, we went straight for the food and beer, of course. 5 hours later, we realized we could probably stay here forever. The beer garden is the perfect place for a relaxing afternoon.

text: Der englische Garten ist die grÃ¼ne Lunge von MÃ¼nchen und einer der grÃ¶ÃŸten Parks der Welt! text: Dieser riesige Garten mit See- CafÃ©s und Biergarten- ein Spazier- und Erholungstreffpunkt mitten in der Stadt!  Herrlich diese Anlage!

title: Expansive Park in the heart of Munich
text: A truly beautiful park that adds loads of value to the city of Munich. Few cities have such a large and accommodating green space. Great place to go for a half-hour walk or spend an entire Sunday, swimming, lounging and playing sports. The people of Munich really value and make use of this awesome space.

title: Surf's up!
text: Yes, a beautiful, huge and peaceful park.  But with two (2) surfing spots on the river flowing through it!  Very busy beer garden at the Chinese Tower, with fun food and beer!

title: Lush day!
text: We hired donkey bikes and pootled around the park for a very pleasant morning. We had a giant pretzel at one of the beer gardens and paddled in the river; we watched some surfers surfing a river wave and listened to some oompah music at the Chinese pagoda! Some naked sunbathers provided amusement to very British girls and all in all itâ€™s a lovely day out!

title: Great public park.
text: The pagoda in the middle with the beer garden was awesome and food was fantastic.  It was still open in March - it was chilly but still comfortable.  Friendly people and clean space.Travel date below says September 2018 only because i was unable to choose March 2018.

title: Beautiful Park with a great beer garden in the middle.
text: We were lucky enough to wander through the English Garden on a gorgeous August day. It's a beautiful, English style park - informal grass and trees with numerous winding paths. There's relief from the summer heat in the middle with a cool, shady beer garden and it's a highlight on a summer evening to watch the surfers at the southern end!

text: Parque bastante grande, com muitos lugares pra sentar.O Rio Izar passa por ele, Rio super limpo...Recomendo para um passeio de 1/2 dia.

title: Walk or Swim
text: I took a walk and if you don't remember the path you took, you can exist from a total different end. The garden is so beautiful full of long trees, grass and 2 rivers. Some locals where just relaxed on the grass and enjoying the sun and others having a bath in the river.

title: Great place to walk
text: The English Garden was about 20 minute walk from our hotel.  It is large, very well kept and easily accessible.  Navigation maps were available at convenient locations.  The river surfing area is something to see - it is a novelty for a land locked city.

title: Great way to spend a day
text: We spent half a day riding bikes around the park and stopped for lunch at the Chinese Beer Garden. The park is beautiful and huge. You could easily spend a day roaming around, having lunch, and watching the surfers on your way out.

title: Oase in drukke stad.
text: Prachtig park in het centrum van de stad. heerlijk om te wandelen of te fietsen (zelf om te zwemmen). Must see!

title: Agradable y amplio
text: Nos encantÃ³ pasear por el jardÃ­n y localizar sus puntos de interÃ©s, desde la ola que surfean en el rÃ­o hasta una pagoda de 5 plantas. Recomendable con buen tiempo solo, incluso para hacer un picnic o tomar el sol en un descanso

title: aire limpio
text: Con buen tiempo es ideal para dar un paseo, comer un picnic o simplemente disfrutar del aire limpio. Se trata de unos amplÃ­simos jardines, zonas arboladas y un rÃ­o con patitos. Precioso de verdad! Merece l pena verlo
